GP12nardp2_u:2772: tanmayā nahi dattaṃ tu bhartre vyasanine tadā // NarP_2,27.62 //
GP12nardp2_u:2782: gatā viśīrṇatāṃ tatra mṛtāste nāvamāśritāḥ // NarP_2,27.67 //
GP12nardp2_u:2788: ullikhantaṃ hi śikharaiḥ khamadhyaṃ svātmanastribhiḥ // NarP_2,27.70 //
GP12nardp2_u:2789: taṃ dṛṣṭvā parvataṃ divyaṃ tyaktvā naukāṣṭhamadbhutam /
GP12nardp2_u:2792: tata utthāya bhakṣyārthaṃ vṛkṣāṃstatra vyalokayat // NarP_2,27.72 //
GP12nardp2_u:2796: tasyādhastātsa suṣvāpa svottarīyaṃ prasārya ca // NarP_2,27.74 //
GP12nardp2_u:2800: abhyagādrākṣaso ghoro garjamāno yathā ghanaḥ // NarP_2,27.76 //
GP12nardp2_u:2802: śubhāṃ kāśīpateḥ putrīṃ nāmnā ratnāvalīṃ śubhām // NarP_2,27.77 //
GP12nardp2_u:2804: patikāmā kumārī sā nāvindatsadṛśaṃ patim // NarP_2,27.78 //
GP12nardp2_u:2806: pitā tasyāḥ pradāne tu cintāviṣṭo hyaharnniśam // NarP_2,27.79 //
GP12nardp2_u:2808: aṭamānena pāpena dṛṣṭā sā rūpaśālinī // NarP_2,27.80 //
GP12nardp2_u:2810: ubhayordaśa ratnāni niṣke ca daśapañca ca // NarP_2,27.81 //
GP12nardp2_u:2811: sīmante sapta ratnāni keyūre 'ṣṭau ca pañca ca /
GP12nardp2_u:2816: tatra tasya guhāṃ dṛṣṭvā suvarṇasadṛśaprabhām // NarP_2,27.84 //
GP12nardp2_u:2823: tasyāstu ruditaṃ śrutvā tasya bhāryā hi rākṣasī /
GP12nardp2_u:2824: ājagāma tvarāyuktā yatrāsau rākṣasaḥ sthitaḥ // NarP_2,27.88 //
GP12nardp2_u:2826: papraccha nijabhartāraṃ kruddhā nirbhartsatī satī // NarP_2,27.89 //
GP12nardp2_u:2828: anyāṃ samīhase bhāryāṃ nāhaṃ bhāryāṃ bhavāmi te // NarP_2,27.90 //
GP12nardp2_u:2830: uvāca rākṣaso harṣātsvāṃ priyāṃ cārulocanām // NarP_2,27.91 //
GP12nardp2_u:2832: daivopapāditaṃ dvāri dvitīyaṃ mama tiṣṭhati // NarP_2,27.92 //
GP12nardp2_u:2836: mithyā rākṣasi bhartā te bhāṣate tvadbhayādayam // NarP_2,27.94 //
GP12nardp2_u:2838: suptāṃ pitṛgṛhe rātrau māṃ samāsādya kāmataḥ // NarP_2,27.95 //
GP12nardp2_u:2844: avaśyaṃ mūrghniṃ kīlaṃ me roṣayiṣyati rākṣasaḥ // NarP_2,27.98 //
GP12nardp2_u:2846: yā sāpatnyena duḥkhena pīḍyamānā hi jīvati // NarP_2,27.99 //
GP12nardp2_u:2849: evaṃ sā bahu saṃcintya bhartāraṃ vākyamabravīt /
GP12nardp2_u:2850: madīyā mama bhakṣyārthaṃ tvayānītā sulocanā // NarP_2,27.101 //
GP12nardp2_u:2852: tataḥ sa rākṣasaḥ prāha gacchagaccheti satvaram // NarP_2,27.102 //
GP12nardp2_u:2854: tataḥ sā rākṣasī ghorā śrutvā patisamīritam // NarP_2,27.103 //
GP12nardp2_u:2857: taṃ dṛṣṭvā māyayā bhūtvā suṃdarī ṣoḍaśābdikā /
GP12nardp2_u:2862: svabhartrāhaṃ parityaktā tvāṃ patiṃ kartumāgatā // NarP_2,27.107 //
GP12nardp2_u:2863: tacchrutvā vacanaṃ tasyā bhartā me bhayasaṃyutaḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:2864: uvāca vacanaṃ prājño dhairyamālaṃbya tāṃ śubhe // NarP_2,27.108 //
GP12nardp2_u:2866: mānuṣāstu smṛtā bhakṣyā rākṣasānāṃ na saṃśayaḥ // NarP_2,27.109 //
GP12nardp2_u:2867: tacchrutvā vacanaṃ sā tu punastaṃ prāha sādaram /
GP12nardp2_u:2870: hiḍaṃbā rākṣasī vipra bhīmabhāryā bhaviṣyati // NarP_2,27.111 //
GP12nardp2_u:2874: bhāryā tavāhaṃ saṃjātā dava hi balavattaram // NarP_2,27.113 //
GP12nardp2_u:2876: tadantaraṃ samāsādya bhartā me ghorarākṣasaḥ // NarP_2,27.114 //
GP12nardp2_u:2878: seyaṃ samāśritā cātra śālavṛkṣe tu vāsavī // NarP_2,27.115 //
GP12nardp2_u:2883: yadi tvamanayā śaktyā na hiṃsasi niśācaram /
GP12nardp2_u:2884: khādayiṣyati durmedhāstvāṃ ca māṃ ca na saśayaḥ // NarP_2,27.118 //
GP12nardp2_u:2890: tadātmakagṛtapuṇyasya na bhaveyaṃ hi bhāginī // NarP_2,27.121 //
GP12nardp2_u:2892: tāṃ gatiṃ hi prapadye 'haṃ yadyetadanṛtaṃ bhavet // NarP_2,27.122 //
GP12nardp2_u:2893: madyaṃ hi pibato brahman brāhmaṇasya durātmanaḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:2894: yā gatirvihitā ghorā tāṃ gatiṃ prāpnuyāmyaham // NarP_2,27.123 //
GP12nardp2_u:2896: yā gatistāṃ dvijaśreṣṭha mithyā procya samāpnuyām // NarP_2,27.124 //
GP12nardp2_u:2898: ātmano hanane yā hi vihitā munibhirdvija // NarP_2,27.125 //
GP12nardp2_u:2900: pañcamyāṃ ca tathāṣṭamyāṃ yatpāpaṃ māṃsabhakṣaṇe // NarP_2,27.126 //
GP12nardp2_u:2902: yaducchiṣṭe ghṛtaṃ bhokturmaithunena divā ca yat // NarP_2,27.127 //
GP12nardp2_u:2905: tailaṃ bhoktuśca saṃkrāntau gobhistīrthaṃ ca gacchataḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:2910: gohīnāṃ mahiṣīṃ dharturbhinnakāṃsye ca bhuñjataḥ // NarP_2,27.131 //
GP12nardp2_u:2914: tena pāpena lipye 'haṃ yadi vacmi tavānṛtam // NarP_2,27.133 //
GP12nardp2_u:2916: sarveṣāṃ bhāginī cāhaṃ yadyetadanṛtaṃ vade // NarP_2,27.134 //
GP12nardp2_u:2917: evaṃ saṃbodhito devi bhartā me pāpayā tayā /
GP12nardp2_u:2918: tatheti niścayaṃ cakre bhavitavyena mohitaḥ // NarP_2,27.135 //
GP12nardp2_u:2921: śīghramānaya tāṃ śaktiṃ karomi vacanaṃ tava /
GP12nardp2_u:2922: sarvametatpradeyaṃ hi tvayā me rākṣase hate // NarP_2,27.137 //
GP12nardp2_u:2924: tacchrutvā rākṣasī śaktiṃ samānīya nagasthitām // NarP_2,27.138 //
GP12nardp2_u:2926: etasminneva kāle tu rākṣasaḥ kāmamohitaḥ // NarP_2,27.139 //
GP12nardp2_u:2930: tava doṣo na cehāsti bhavitavyaṃ mamedṛśam // NarP_2,27.141 //
GP12nardp2_u:2934: vidhinā preryamāṇastu janaḥ sarvatra gacchati // NarP_2,27.143 //
GP12nardp2_u:2936: vidhainā vihite mārge kiṃ kariṣyati paṇḍitaḥ // NarP_2,27.144 //
GP12nardp2_u:2938: ghṛtaṃ jalaṃ kuśānagniṃ vivāhaṃ vidhinā kuru // NarP_2,27.145 //
GP12nardp2_u:2940: brāhmaṇasyaiva vākyena vivāhaḥ saphalo bhavet // NarP_2,27.146 //
GP12nardp2_u:2941: na hato yadi viprastu bhāryayā tava rākṣasa /
GP12nardp2_u:2942: vṛtte homasya kārye tu taṃ bhavān bhakṣayiṣyati // NarP_2,27.147 //
GP12nardp2_u:2943: evamukte tu vacane tayā vai rājakanyayā /
GP12nardp2_u:2947: savyaṃ cāpyasphurannetraṃ svavastraṃ skhalitaṃ tathā // NarP_2,27.150 //
GP12nardp2_u:2951: parityajāmi tvāṃ pāpaṃ rākṣasaṃ krūrakarmiṇam // NarP_2,27.152 //
GP12nardp2_u:2955: utkṣipya bāhū pravidārya vaktraṃ saṃprasthito bhakṣayituṃ sa cobhau /
GP12nardp2_u:2957: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇottarabhāge mohinīcarite kāṣṭhīlopākhyānaṃ nāma saptaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp2_u:2960: dṛṣṭvā sā rākṣasī prāha bhartāraṃ mama śaṅkitā // NarP_2,28.1 //
GP12nardp2_u:2963: tasyā vākyānmama patiḥ pauruṣe tu vyavasthitaḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:2964: mumoca vipulāṃ śaktiṃ rakṣovakṣasthala prati // NarP_2,28.3 //
GP12nardp2_u:2969: kṛtvā bhasmāvaśeṣaṃ tu rākṣasaṃ gaganaṃ yayau /
GP12nardp2_u:2972: athovāca dvijaṃ hṛṣṭā rākṣasī śubhalocanam // NarP_2,28.7 //
GP12nardp2_u:2973: ehi kānta guhāṃ ramyāṃ praviśa tvaṃ yadṛcchayā /
GP12nardp2_u:2974: bhuṅkṣva bhogānmayā sārddhaṃ ye divyā ye ca mānuṣāḥ // NarP_2,28.8 //
GP12nardp2_u:2976: tataḥ sādāya me kāntaṃ svāṃ praviṣṭā guhāṃ mudā // NarP_2,28.9 //
GP12nardp2_u:2979: darśayāmāsa tāṃ tanvīṃ kumārīṃ śayane sthitām /
GP12nardp2_u:2982: yasyāḥ sīmāṃ na laṅghanti pātakāni hyaśeṣataḥ // NarP_2,28.12 //
GP12nardp2_u:2983: śaktikṣetraṃ ca tāṃ prāhuḥ puṇyaṃ pāpakṣayaṅkaram /
GP12nardp2_u:2985: yasyāṃ mṛtāḥ punarmartyā garbhavāsaṃ viśanti na /
GP12nardp2_u:2986: sa tvamasyā gṛhaṃ pitryaṃ punarnaya sulocanām // NarP_2,28.14 //
GP12nardp2_u:2988: mayā saha samastāni vikrīṇīhi nijecchayā // NarP_2,28.15 //
GP12nardp2_u:2990: mugdhayā tava rūpeṇa preṣito yamasādanam // NarP_2,28.16 //
GP12nardp2_u:2992: bhajasva māṃ viśālākṣa bhaktāṃ vai kāmarūpiṇīm // NarP_2,28.17 //
GP12nardp2_u:2993: etacchrutvā tu vacanaṃ bhartā me cārulocane /
GP12nardp2_u:2994: rākṣasyāḥ kāmataptāyāḥ kumāryāḥ sannidhau śubhe // NarP_2,28.18 //
GP12nardp2_u:2995: uvāca rākṣasīṃ tāṃ tu saśaṅko madhuraṃ vacaḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:2996: subhage nītiśāstreṣu viśvastavyā na yoṣitaḥ // NarP_2,28.19 //
GP12nardp2_u:2997: kaumāraṃ yā patiṃ hanti sā kathaṃ māṃ na hiṃsati /
GP12nardp2_u:2998: matto rūpādhikaṃ matvā paraṃ puruṣalaṃpaṭā // NarP_2,28.20 //
GP12nardp2_u:3000: adya vātha paredyurvā pakṣe māse 'tha vatsare /
GP12nardp2_u:3001: vyāpādaya yathecchaṃ vā tvāṃ prapanno 'smi bhāmini // NarP_2,28.22 //
GP12nardp2_u:3002: evameva tvayā kāryaṃ nādya copakṛtaṃ tava /
GP12nardp2_u:3003: ātmā te sarvathā deyaḥ pratīkārasya hetave // NarP_2,28.23 //
GP12nardp2_u:3004: madarthe nihato bhartā tvayā niḥśaṅkayā yataḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:3005: tato 'haṃ nottaraṃ vacmi paraṃ kiñcitsulocane // NarP_2,28.24 //
GP12nardp2_u:3007: viśvastahiṃsanaṃ brahman brahmahatyā samaṃ bhavet // NarP_2,28.25 //
GP12nardp2_u:3009: patiṃ tathāpi garheyaṃ viśvastaṃ ghātaye katham // NarP_2,28.26 //
GP12nardp2_u:3010: sūkṣmā hi dharmasya gatirna jñāyeta kathañcana /
GP12nardp2_u:3014: śrūyate ca purāṇeṣu kiñcidatra nigadyate // NarP_2,28.28 //
GP12nardp2_u:3021: īśasya kṛtyaṃ dvija durvibhāvyaṃ dharmānukūlyena samāsthitasya /
GP12nardp2_u:3027: teṣāṃ saṃkīrtanaṃ puṇyaṃ pavitraṃ pāpanāśanam // NarP_2,28.34 //
GP12nardp2_u:3028: yaṃ dhyāyanti smarantyaddhā yogamūrtiḥ sanātanaḥ // NarP_2,28.35 //
GP12nardp2_u:3037: nārado nārado bhūyo bhūyo bhūyo 'pi nāradaḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:3044: yaḥ svayaṃ rāmacandrasya guruḥ sarveśvarasya ca // NarP_2,28.43 //
GP12nardp2_u:3046: yo damitvā vibhurvindhyaṃ vātāpiṃ sāgaraṃ sthitaḥ // NarP_2,28.44 //
GP12nardp2_u:3048: yo vidhiḥ karmasākṣyādivandyo mānyaḥ pitāmahaḥ // NarP_2,28.45 //
GP12nardp2_u:3050: yaḥ śivaḥ śivadaḥ sākṣātprakṛtīśaḥ parātparaḥ // NarP_2,28.46 //
GP12nardp2_u:3052: tasmāddvija sadācāro niṣevyo vidhinā vidhiḥ // NarP_2,28.47 //
GP12nardp2_u:3057: śṛṇu viprātra dharmasya gatiṃ sūkṣmāṃ vadāmyaham /
GP12nardp2_u:3058: yadā samāgato bhartā mama kanyāṃ samāharan // NarP_2,28.50 //
GP12nardp2_u:3059: tvāṃ paśyan nijakarmasthaṃ ko 'pi doṣo na tasya vai /
GP12nardp2_u:3060: mayā pṛṣṭaḥ kathaṃ nāma kanyeyaṃ samupāhṛtā // NarP_2,28.51 //
GP12nardp2_u:3062: tanniśamyāha māṃ baddhā svayaṃ cāsthāni darśanāt // NarP_2,28.52 //
GP12nardp2_u:3063: ye vadanti ca dāṃpatye bhāryā mokṣavirodhinī /
GP12nardp2_u:3064: na te tattvadṛśo jñeyā na sā bhāryā virodhinī // NarP_2,28.53 //
GP12nardp2_u:3067: pāpaṃ kimatra tanmattaḥ samyakchṛṇu svayaṃ vara /
GP12nardp2_u:3068: alīkaṃ naiva vaktavyaṃ prāṇaiḥ kaṇṭhagatairapi // NarP_2,28.55 //
GP12nardp2_u:3070: satye samāsthito brahmā satye santaḥ samāsthitāḥ // NarP_2,28.56 //
GP12nardp2_u:3072: satyaṃ brūyāditi vaco vedānteṣu pragīyate // NarP_2,28.57 //
GP12nardp2_u:3074: satyaṃ tu sarvadā vipra maṅgalaṃ maṅgalapradam // NarP_2,28.58 //
GP12nardp2_u:3076: strīṣu satyaṃ na vaktavyaṃ tatrāpi śṛṇu kāraṇam // NarP_2,28.59 //
GP12nardp2_u:3080: sākṣye yatra vivāheṣu dāṃpatyaṃ tadudīritam // NarP_2,28.61 //
GP12nardp2_u:3090: śubhaṃ vāpyaśubhaṃ vipra taṃ tu śāntaṃ vidurbudhāḥ // NarP_2,28.66 //
GP12nardp2_u:3092: evamādi viditvā tu nāyaṃ bhartā nipātitaḥ // NarP_2,28.67 //
GP12nardp2_u:3097: tena dharmeṇa kiṃ prāptamiti samyaṅnibodha me /
GP12nardp2_u:3098: rākṣasīṃ yonimāpannā rākṣasasya priyā hyaham // NarP_2,28.70 //
GP12nardp2_u:3100: dharmakāmadughā dhenuḥ saṃtoṣo nandanaṃ vanam // NarP_2,28.71 //
GP12nardp2_u:3101: vidyā mokṣakarī proktā tṛṣṇā vaitaraṇī nadī /
GP12nardp2_u:3104: iyaṃ tvasaṃginī bhāryā bhaviṣyati piturgṛhe // NarP_2,28.73 //
GP12nardp2_u:3106: matsaṃgamātpūrvameva yā bhāryā vipra te 'bhavat // NarP_2,28.74 //
GP12nardp2_u:3108: sāpi tiryaggatiṃ prāpya mucyate madanugrahāt // NarP_2,28.75 //
GP12nardp2_u:3112: puruṣo me sahabhavo damito dharmakāraṇāt // NarP_2,28.77 //
GP12nardp2_u:3114: taṃ patiṃ prāpya viprendra prākkarmavaśāgā hyaham // NarP_2,28.78 //
GP12nardp2_u:3117: tatra yonau mayā labdho bhartāyaṃ rākṣasādhipaḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:3118: gobhilo nāma tejasvī sa tvayā vinipātitaḥ // NarP_2,28.80 //
GP12nardp2_u:3122: śubhasya balamāpannā jātā tava sahāyinī // NarP_2,28.82 //
GP12nardp2_u:3124: bhāryātha pāpinā brahmaṃstena vyāpādito mayā // NarP_2,28.83 //
GP12nardp2_u:3125: viśvasto hi yatastvaṃ vai mama sarveṇa cetasā /
GP12nardp2_u:3128: kṛtsnasya puruṣasyeha sannidhau vyāhṛto mayā // NarP_2,28.85 //
GP12nardp2_u:3129: na karoṣi dvijaśreṣṭha saṃvidaṃ hyanyathā kvacit /
GP12nardp2_u:3130: madvākye bhavatā stheyaṃ sarvakṛtyeṣu mānada // NarP_2,28.86 //
GP12nardp2_u:3132: pratipede vacaḥ sarvaṃ yatkṛtaṃ hi tayā tadā // NarP_2,28.87 //
GP12nardp2_u:3133: tataḥ sā rākṣasī sarvaṃ saṃpragṛhya guhādhanam /
GP12nardp2_u:3134: kareṇurūpiṇī bhūtvā pṛṣṭhe kṛtvā patiṃ mama // NarP_2,28.88 //
GP12nardp2_u:3142: iyaṃ pāpataroḥ kānta kuṭhārā parikīrtitā // NarP_2,29.2 //
GP12nardp2_u:3145: ādyaṃ hi vaiṣṇavaṃ sthānaṃ purāṇāḥ saṃpracakṣate /
GP12nardp2_u:3146: nāvaiṣṇave sthale muktiḥ sarvasya tu kadācana // NarP_2,29.4 //
GP12nardp2_u:3151: gatvā tatra mahādevo brahmāṇaṃ jagatāṃ gurum /
GP12nardp2_u:3152: namaskṛtya sthito hyagre vedapāṭhaṃ niśāmayan // NarP_2,29.7 //
GP12nardp2_u:3158: cakarta tannakhāgreṇa khasthaṃ vaktraṃ trilocanaḥ // NarP_2,29.10 //
GP12nardp2_u:3160: vāme nirdhūtamāniśaṃ na nivṛttaṃ dvijottama // NarP_2,29.11 //
GP12nardp2_u:3161: brahmā tu duḥkhito bhūtvā tasthau sthāṇuṃ vyalokayan /
GP12nardp2_u:3162: rudro 'pi lajjito bhūtvā nirjjagāma tvarānvitaḥ // NarP_2,29.12 //
GP12nardp2_u:3167: taṃ dṛṣṭvā devadeveśaṃ viṣṇuṃ sarvagataṃ dvija /
GP12nardp2_u:3168: nanāma śirasā namro niṣprabho vṛṣabhadhvajaḥ // NarP_2,29.15 //
GP12nardp2_u:3171: śaṃbho tvayā kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ yaccinnaṃ brahmaṇaḥ śiraḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:3172: tatphalaṃ bhuṅkṣva sarṃvajña kiyatkālaṃ kṛtaṃ svayam // NarP_2,29.17 //
GP12nardp2_u:3174: nābhuktaṃ kṣīyate karma hyapi janmaśataiḥ priya // NarP_2,29.18 //
GP12nardp2_u:3175: kiṃ karomi kva gacchāmi tvāṃ dṛṣṭvā duḥkhitaṃ haram /
GP12nardp2_u:3176: prāṇā vikalatāṃ yānti mama tvadduḥkhadarśanāt // NarP_2,29.19 //
GP12nardp2_u:3177: yāni kāni ca pāpāni mahānti mahatāṃ gate /
GP12nardp2_u:3178: na tāni brahmahatyāyāḥ samānīti matirmama // NarP_2,29.20 //
GP12nardp2_u:3180: brahmahatyābhibhūtastu kṣaṇaṃ sthātuṃ na ca kṣamaḥ // NarP_2,29.21 //
GP12nardp2_u:3188: ityukto viṣṇunā vipra sthāṇuḥ sarvagato 'bhavat // NarP_2,29.25 //
GP12nardp2_u:3190: varṣatrayaṃ bhramitvā tu prāpto badarikāśramam // NarP_2,29.26 //
GP12nardp2_u:3192: dvārastho dehi bhikṣāṃ me viṣṇo ityavadanmuhuḥ // NarP_2,29.27 //
GP12nardp2_u:3193: tato nārāyaṇo devo dṛṣṭvā dvāri sthitaṃ haram /
GP12nardp2_u:3194: gṛhāṇa bhikṣāmityuktvā pradadau dakṣiṇaṃ karam // NarP_2,29.28 //
GP12nardp2_u:3195: tato haro hariṃ dṛṣṭvā bhikṣāṃ dātuṃ samudyatam /
GP12nardp2_u:3200: dvitīyā tanmukhe prāptā payasyātha tṛtīyakā // NarP_2,29.31 //
GP12nardp2_u:3202: tā dhārāstrīṇi varṣāṇi saṃsevya vidhivaddharaḥ // NarP_2,29.32 //
GP12nardp2_u:3203: kiñcitprīto yayau kṣetraṃ kuroḥ puṇyakaraṃ dvija /
GP12nardp2_u:3204: tatra gatvā haraḥ sthāṇurbhūtastatra papāta ca // NarP_2,29.33 //
GP12nardp2_u:3206: varṣatraye gate tatra kṣatārddhāṅgo viniḥsṛtaḥ // NarP_2,29.34 //
GP12nardp2_u:3208: tatastuṣṭo jagannātho varaṃ tasmai dadau tu saḥ // NarP_2,29.35 //
GP12nardp2_u:3209: gaccha kāśīmito bhrāntvā tīrthāni bahuśo hara /
GP12nardp2_u:3210: tato hariṃ namaskṛtya parītya bahudhā tathā // NarP_2,29.36 //
GP12nardp2_u:3215: tuṣṭāva prayato bhūtvā mādhavaṃ vandyamīśvaram // NarP_2,29.38 //
GP12nardp2_u:3216: jaya jaya jagadīśa nātha viṣṇo jagadānandanidhāna vedavedya /
GP12nardp2_u:3217: madhumathana nṛsiṃha pītavāso garuḍādhiṣṭhita mādhavādideva // NarP_2,29.39 //
GP12nardp2_u:3223: bhavabhayahara bhaktavaśya gopa praṇattoddhāraka puṇyakīrtinām // NarP_2,29.42 //
GP12nardp2_u:3227: kamalakara kuśeśayā dhivāsa priyakāmonmathana tryadhīśavandya // NarP_2,29.43 //
GP12nardp2_u:3229: haladhara duritāpaha praṇamya triguṇavyāpta jagattrikāladakṣa // NarP_2,29.44 //
GP12nardp2_u:3231: raviśaśinayana pragalbhaceṣṭa pradhutadhvānta navāṃbudābha meśa // NarP_2,29.45 //
GP12nardp2_u:3237: tava varada vareṇyamaṅghriyugmaṃ śaraṇaṃ prāptamaghārditaṃ prapāhi // NarP_2,29.48 //
GP12nardp2_u:3238: nahi mama gatidaṃ purāṇapuṃso 'nyaditi prārthanayā prasīda'medya // NarP_2,29.49 //
GP12nardp2_u:3239: iti stuto jagannātho bhaktyā devena śaṃbhunā /
GP12nardp2_u:3241: taṃ dṛṣṭvā daṇḍavadbhūmau nipapāta haro harim /
GP12nardp2_u:3244: varaṃ vṛṇu pradāsye 'haṃ saṃtuṣṭaḥ stotratastava // NarP_2,29.52 //
GP12nardp2_u:3250: mama nirgamane brahmahatyā māṃ punareṣyati // NarP_2,29.55 //
GP12nardp2_u:3251: tvatkṣetre saṃsthito 'haṃ tu pūjāṃ prāpsye jagattraye /
GP12nardp2_u:3254: tataḥ prabhṛti viprendra śaivaṃ kṣetraṃ nigadyate // NarP_2,29.57 //
GP12nardp2_u:3255: kṣetraṃ tu keśavasyedaṃ purāṇaṃ kavayo viduḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:3258: mādhavasyājñayā tatra sasnau devo vṛṣadhvajaḥ // NarP_2,29.59 //
GP12nardp2_u:3263: yaṃ tu brahmādayo devāḥ svaḥsthāḥ paśyati sarvadā /
GP12nardp2_u:3267: sarve lokāḥ sthitā hyatra śivaḥ kāśīti cintakāḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:3268: śivasya cintanādvipra śaivāḥ sarve nirākulāḥ // NarP_2,29.64 //
GP12nardp2_u:3272: nātra snānaṃ praśaṃsaṃti na japaṃ na surārcanam // NarP_2,29.66 //
GP12nardp2_u:3274: mṛtyuṃ prātyuṃ naraḥ kāmaṃ kṛtakṛtyo bhaveddhruvan // NarP_2,29.67 //
GP12nardp2_u:3278: viyojitā tu yā pūrvaṃ tena duṣṭena rakṣasā // NarP_2,29.69 //
GP12nardp2_u:3280: eṣa prabhāvo 'pi hitaḥ kṣetrasyāsya dvijotma // NarP_2,29.70 //
GP12nardp2_u:3283: eṣā purī karmavināśanāya kṛṣṇena pūrvaṃ hi vinirmitābhūt /
GP12nardp2_u:3284: yasyāṃ mṛtā duḥkhamanantamugraṃ bhuñjanti martyā yamayātanāṃ no // NarP_2,29.72 //
GP12nardp2_u:3285: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇottarabhāge mohinīcarite kāṣṭhīlopākhyāne rākṣasīcarite kāśīvarṇanaṃ nāma ekonatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp2_u:3291: sā kumārī tataḥ prāpya nagaraṃ svapituḥ śubham /
GP12nardp2_u:3293: gaccha tvaṃ nṛpateḥ pārśvaṃ piturmama purādhipa /
GP12nardp2_u:3294: brūhi māṃ samanuprāptāṃ ratnaśālāṃ purā hṛtām // NarP_2,30.4 //
GP12nardp2_u:3296: talpasthā rakṣasā rātrau svapurasthā hṛtā dvija // NarP_2,30.5 //
GP12nardp2_u:3298: samāśvasihi śokaṃ tvaṃ mā kṛthā matkṛte kvacit // NarP_2,30.6 //
GP12nardp2_u:3304: rājannupāgatā naṣṭā dihitā tava mānada // NarP_2,30.9 //
GP12nardp2_u:3306: purabāhye sthitā dṛṣṭā mayā jñātā na cābhavat // NarP_2,30.10 //
GP12nardp2_u:3307: tayāhaṃ preritaḥ prāgāṃ tvāṃ vijñāpayituṃ prabho /
GP12nardp2_u:3308: aviplutāhaṃ vadati māṃ jānātu samāgatām // NarP_2,30.11 //
GP12nardp2_u:3309: pitaraṃ mama satkṛtyai nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
GP12nardp2_u:3310: tadadbhutaṃ vacaḥ śrutvā purapālasya tatkṣaṇāt // NarP_2,30.12 //
GP12nardp2_u:3312: sa tu gatvā purādbrāhye gaṅgātīre vyavasthitām // NarP_2,30.13 //
GP12nardp2_u:3314: sahaje naiva veṣeṇa bhūṣitāṃ bhūṣaṇapriyām // NarP_2,30.14 //
GP12nardp2_u:3317: pitaraṃ sāpi saṃhṛṣṭā samāśliṣya nanāma ha /
GP12nardp2_u:3318: tataśca mātrā saṃgamya hṛṣṭayā harṣitāntarā // NarP_2,30.16 //
GP12nardp2_u:3319: prāha vākyaṃ viśālākṣī saṃbodhya pitaraṃ nṛpam /
GP12nardp2_u:3322: cintayatnī bhartṛyogaṃ niśīthe rakṣasā hṛtā // NarP_2,30.18 //
GP12nardp2_u:3323: sa māṃ gṛhītvā svapuraṃ prāgādarṇavage girau /
GP12nardp2_u:3324: nānāratnamaye tatra guhāyāṃ sthāpitā hyaham // NarP_2,30.19 //
GP12nardp2_u:3326: tasya bhāryā tviyaṃ subhrūryā tiṣṭhati sumadhyamā // NarP_2,30.20 //
GP12nardp2_u:3328: anayā buddhiyogena śaktyā śakrasya bhūpate // NarP_2,30.21 //
GP12nardp2_u:3330: puraiva mama taṃ śailaṃ prāpto devena bhūsuraḥ // NarP_2,30.22 //
GP12nardp2_u:3331: iyaṃ tu rākṣasī dṛṣṭvā patiṃ svaṃ dharmadūṣakam /
GP12nardp2_u:3332: vipreṇa saṃvidaṃ kṛtvā dāṃpatye nijakarmaṇā // NarP_2,30.23 //
GP12nardp2_u:3334: evaṃ kṛtvā patiṃ vipraṃ hastinīrūpadhāriṇī // NarP_2,30.24 //
GP12nardp2_u:3336: samāyātātra bhūpāla māmattuṃ tava mandiram // NarP_2,30.25 //
GP12nardp2_u:3339: asyā evāmumatyā māṃ dehyasmai brāhmaṇāya hi /
GP12nardp2_u:3340: anenaikāsanagatā jātā bhartā sa me bhavat // NarP_2,30.27 //
GP12nardp2_u:3341: yenaikāsanagā nārī bhavedbhartā sa eva hi /
GP12nardp2_u:3342: nānya itthaṃ purāṇeṣu śrūyate hyāgameṣvapi // NarP_2,30.28 //
GP12nardp2_u:3343: asyāḥ pṛṣṭhe niviṣṭāhaṃ prītyā saha dvijanmanā /
GP12nardp2_u:3344: dharmata stena madbhartā bhavedeṣā matirmama // NarP_2,30.29 //
GP12nardp2_u:3346: dehi viprāya māṃ tāta pitamanyaṃ vṛṇe na ca // NarP_2,30.30 //
GP12nardp2_u:3349: sutaiṣā dharmabhītā me tvāmeva śaraṇaṃ gatā /
GP12nardp2_u:3350: yadarthaṃ nihataḥ kāntastvayā pūrvataraḥ sati // NarP_2,30.32 //
GP12nardp2_u:3351: tvadadhīnā tato bhadre jāteyaṃ matsutā kila /
GP12nardp2_u:3352: imamicchati bhartāraṃ yo 'yaṃ bhartā kṛtastvayā // NarP_2,30.33 //
GP12nardp2_u:3354: anumodaya sāhāyye sutāṃ mama sulocane // NarP_2,30.34 //
GP12nardp2_u:3356: sāpatnabhāvaṃ tyaktvā tu sutāṃ me paripālaya // NarP_2,30.35 //
GP12nardp2_u:3357: sutāyā mama bhāryāyā madbalasya janasya ca /
GP12nardp2_u:3358: purasya viṣayasyāpi svāminī tvaṃ na saṃśayaḥ // NarP_2,30.36 //
GP12nardp2_u:3359: tava vākye sthitā hyeṣā sadaivāpi bhaviṣyati /
GP12nardp2_u:3360: etacchruttvā tu vacanaṃ sudyumnasya niśācarī // NarP_2,30.37 //
GP12nardp2_u:3362: uvāca ca dharāpālaṃ pradānāya kṛtodyamam // NarP_2,30.38 //
GP12nardp2_u:3365: ahaṃ ca bhavatā pūjyā kṛtvārcāṃ devamandire /
GP12nardp2_u:3366: sarvaiśca nāgaraiḥ sārddhaṃ phālgune dhavale dale // NarP_2,30.40 //
GP12nardp2_u:3370: evaṃ prakurvate tubhyaṃ sadā kṣemakarī hyaham // NarP_2,30.42 //
GP12nardp2_u:3372: tacchrutvā vacanaṃ tasyāḥ sudyumno nṛpatistadā // NarP_2,30.43 //
GP12nardp2_u:3374: pratipanne tu vacasi rājñā tuṣṭā tu rākṣasī // NarP_2,30.34 //
GP12nardp2_u:3381: tato mayā śrutaṃ devi bhartā te samupāgataḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:3385: kathaṃ yāsyasi bhartāraṃ dhanalubdhe śriyā vṛtam /
GP12nardp2_u:3386: yastvayā nirddhanaḥ pūrvaṃ parityaktaḥ sudīnavat // NarP_2,30.50 //
GP12nardp2_u:3391: gatāyā api te tatra śayanaṃ patinā saha /
GP12nardp2_u:3392: bhaviṣyati durācāre sukhadaṃ na kadācana // NarP_2,30.53 //
GP12nardp2_u:3400: na dattaṃ kaṅkaṇaṃ pāṇerna dattaṃ kaṭisūtrakam // NarP_2,30.57 //
GP12nardp2_u:3401: na cāpi nūpure datte yena tuṣṭiṃ vrajetpatiḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:3402: dhanajīvitayoḥ svāmī bhartā lokeṣu gīyate // NarP_2,30.58 //
GP12nardp2_u:3404: kathaṃ yāsyāmi tadveśma kathaṃ saṃbhāṣaye punaḥ // NarP_2,30.59 //
GP12nardp2_u:3405: yo mayā duṣṭayā tyaktaḥ sa pratyeti kathaṃ hi mām /
GP12nardp2_u:3411: ākāritāsi patyā te vraja śīghraṃ mudānvitā /
GP12nardp2_u:3414: preṣitāḥ satvaraṃ patyā saṃsthitāṃ pitṛveśmani // NarP_2,30.64 //
GP12nardp2_u:3418: āhūtā svāminā gaccha sammānena tadantikam // NarP_2,30.66 //
GP12nardp2_u:3419: svāminākāritā patnī yā na yāti tadantikam /
GP12nardp2_u:3420: sā tu dhvāṅkṣī bhavetputri janmāni daśa pañca ca // NarP_2,30.67 //
GP12nardp2_u:3422: dolāmāropya gaccheti procuḥ snigdhā muhurmurhuḥ // NarP_2,30.68 //
GP12nardp2_u:3424: jagmurmahodayapuraṃ yatra tiṣṭhati me patiḥ // NarP_2,30.69 //
GP12nardp2_u:3425: dṛṣṭaṃ mayā gṛhaṃ tasya sarvataḥ kāñcanāvṛtam /
GP12nardp2_u:3427: atha sā rākṣasī devī sā cāpi nṛpanandinī /
GP12nardp2_u:3428: prītyā ca bhaktyā kurutāṃ praṇatiṃ mama sundari // NarP_2,30.71 //
GP12nardp2_u:3432: pariṣvajya ciraṃ dorbhyāṃ paryaṅke saṃnyaveśayat // NarP_2,30.73 //
GP12nardp2_u:3435: iyaṃ prākkālikī bhāryā jyeṣṭhā ca yuvayordbhuvam /
GP12nardp2_u:3438: tataḥ preṣyānsamāhūya bhartā me vākyamabravīt // NarP_2,30.76 //
GP12nardp2_u:3440: sutāmudvahato rājño yacca labdhaṃ mayākhilam // NarP_2,30.77 //
GP12nardp2_u:3442: iyaṃ hi svāminī prāptā tasya vittasya kiṅkarāḥ // NarP_2,30.78 //
GP12nardp2_u:3444: bhartā samarpayāmāsa prītyā yukto 'khilaṃ tadā // NarP_2,30.79 //
GP12nardp2_u:3450: chinnā gauriva khaṅgena gatāḥ prāṇā mamābhavan // NarP_2,30.82 //
GP12nardp2_u:3452: tāmatītya suduḥkhārtā kāṣṭhīlā cābhavaṃ śubhe // NarP_2,30.83 //
GP12nardp2_u:3454: yā bharturnāpayedvittaṃ jīvitaṃ ca śubhānane // NarP_2,30.84 //
GP12nardp2_u:3456: evaṃ jñātvāniśaṃ rakṣetpatyurvittaṃ ca jīvitam // NarP_2,30.85 //
GP12nardp2_u:3457: patirmātā pitā vittaṃ jīvitaṃ ca gururgatiḥ // NarP_2,30.86 //
GP12nardp2_u:3458: prayāti nārī bahubhiḥ supuṇyaiḥ sahaiva bhartrā svaśarīradāhāt /
GP12nardp2_u:3459: viṣṇoḥ padaṃ vittaśarīralubdhā prayāti yāmīṃ ca kuyonipīḍām // NarP_2,30.87 //
GP12nardp2_u:3460: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇottarabhāge mohinīcarite kāṣṭhīlācaritaṃ nāma triṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp2_u:3463: sandhyāvalī nāma bhṛśaṃ tāmuvāca ha sādaram // NarP_2,31.1 //
GP12nardp2_u:3465: kathaṃ dṛṣṭā mayā tvaṃ ca yāsyantī kutsitāṃ gatim // NarP_2,31.2 //
GP12nardp2_u:3467: tanme vada viśālāṅge tvāṃ dṛṣṭvā duḥkhitā hyaham // NarP_2,31.3 //
GP12nardp2_u:3469: śarīraṃ tava saṃvīkṣya tayā me jāyate hṛdi // NarP_2,31.4 //
GP12nardp2_u:3472: tathāpi naiva mucyeyaṃ sadyaḥ kutsitayonitaḥ // NarP_2,31.5 //
GP12nardp2_u:3476: yasmin krośanti pāpāni brahmahatyādikāni ca // NarP_2,31.7 //
GP12nardp2_u:3477: durlabho māghamāso vai durllabhaṃ janma mānuṣam /
GP12nardp2_u:3478: durllabhaṃ coṣasi snānaṃ durlabhaṃ kṛṣṇasevanam // NarP_2,31.8 //
GP12nardp2_u:3480: devaistejaḥ parikṣiptaṃ māghamāse svakaṃ jale // NarP_2,31.9 //
GP12nardp2_u:3482: nedṛśī saṃgare śūrairgatiḥ prāpyeta saukhyadā // NarP_2,31.10 //
GP12nardp2_u:3486: na saukhyairlabhyate puṇyaṃ duḥkhairevāpyate tu tat // NarP_2,31.12 //
GP12nardp2_u:3488: homārthaṃ sevanaṃ vahnerna ca śītādihānaye // NarP_2,31.13 //
GP12nardp2_u:3492: vāyunā tāḍitaṃ rātrau snāne gaṅgāsamaṃ viduḥ // NarP_2,31.15 //
GP12nardp2_u:3494: tannāsti pātakaṃ yattu māghasnānaṃ na śodhayet // NarP_2,31.16 //
GP12nardp2_u:3496: jīvatā bhujyate duḥkhaṃ mṛtena bahulaṃ sukham // NarP_2,31.17 //
GP12nardp2_u:3502: sūryo me prīyatāṃ devo viṣṇumūrtirnirañjanaḥ // NarP_2,31.20 //
GP12nardp2_u:3510: tvattejasā hataṃ cāstu tattu pāpaṃ sahasradhā // NarP_2,31.24 //
GP12nardp2_u:3515: māghasya dhavale pakṣe bhavedekādaśī tu yā /
GP12nardp2_u:3518: vinirdahati pāpāni kunṛpo viṣayaṃ yathā // NarP_2,31.28 //
GP12nardp2_u:3519: kuputrastu kulaṃ yadvatkubhāryā ca patiṃ yathā /
GP12nardp2_u:3520: adharmastu yathā dharmaṃ kumantrī nṛpatiṃ yathā // NarP_2,31.29 //
GP12nardp2_u:3521: ajñānaṃ ca yathā jñānaṃ kuśaucaṃ śucitāṃ yathā /
GP12nardp2_u:3522: yathā hantyanṛtaṃ satyaṃ vādassaṃvādameva ca // NarP_2,31.30 //
GP12nardp2_u:3524: yathā rasā mahārogāñchrāddhaṃ saṃketa eva ca // NarP_2,31.31 //
GP12nardp2_u:3525: tathā duritasaṃghaṃ tu dvādaśī hanti sādhitā /
GP12nardp2_u:3528: samavetāni caitāni na śāmayati puṣkaram // NarP_2,31.33 //
GP12nardp2_u:3529: na cāpi naimiṣāraṇyaṃ na kṣetraṃ kurusaṃjñitam /
GP12nardp2_u:3530: prabhāso na gayā devi na revā na sarasvatī // NarP_2,31.34 //
GP12nardp2_u:3531: na gagā yamunā caiva prayāgo na ca devakā /
GP12nardp2_u:3532: na sarāṃsi nadāścānye homadānatapāṃsi ca // NarP_2,31.35 //
GP12nardp2_u:3533: na cānyatsukṛtaṃ subhru purāṇe paṭhyate sphuṭam /
GP12nardp2_u:3538: tasminvarāhavapuṣaṃ kṛtvā devaṃ tu hāṭakam // NarP_2,31.38 //
GP12nardp2_u:3539: ghaṭopari nave pātre dhṛtvā tāmramaye śubhe /
GP12nardp2_u:3546: evaṃ kṛte varārohe na bhūyo jāyate kvacit // NarP_2,31.42 //
GP12nardp2_u:3548: tatsarvaṃ nāśamāyāti tamaḥ sūryodaye yathā // NarP_2,31.43 //
GP12nardp2_u:3549: yathāśāstraṃ mayā tubhyaṃ varṇitā dvādaśī śubhe /
GP12nardp2_u:3550: yā sā kṛtā tvayā pūrvamāsīddevyanyajanmani // NarP_2,31.44 //
GP12nardp2_u:3552: bharttustava ca putrasya sarvadā sukhadāyinī // NarP_2,31.45 //
GP12nardp2_u:3554: tadā prītā gamiṣyāmi tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam // NarP_2,31.46 //
GP12nardp2_u:3556: tasya pāvanahetuṃ ca turīyāṃśaṃ prayaccha me // NarP_2,31.47 //
GP12nardp2_u:3558: kṛmiyoniśataṃ gatvā pulkasī jāyate tu sā // NarP_2,31.48 //
GP12nardp2_u:3559: surataṃ yācamānāya patye vittaṃ ca mānini /
GP12nardp2_u:3560: yā na yacchati durbuddhiḥ kāṣṭhīlā jāyate dhruvam // NarP_2,31.49 //
GP12nardp2_u:3562: turīyāṃśamitaṃ puṇyaṃ yadyasti mayi te ghṛṇā // NarP_2,31.50 //
GP12nardp2_u:3564: puṇyaṃ dattavatī tasyai pāṇau vāri pragṛhya ca // NarP_2,31.51 //
GP12nardp2_u:3568: evamukte tu vacane mayā vidyutsamaprabhā // NarP_2,31.53 //
GP12nardp2_u:3570: patirhi daivataṃ loke vañcanīyo na bhāryayā // NarP_2,31.54 //
GP12nardp2_u:3572: sā tvaṃ brūhi pradāsyāmi bharturarthe tavepsitam // NarP_2,31.55 //
GP12nardp2_u:3573: vittaṃ dehaṃ tathā putraṃ yaccānyadvā varānane /
GP12nardp2_u:3574: kimanyaddaivataṃ loke strīṇāmekaṃ patiṃ vinā // NarP_2,31.56 //
GP12nardp2_u:3575: tasyārthe vā tyajedvittaṃ jīvitaṃ vā sulocane /
GP12nardp2_u:3578: patiṃ dadau naiva ca yācitā dhanaṃ tenaiva pāpena babhūva kīṭā // NarP_2,31.58 //
GP12nardp2_u:3580: jñātvā hitaṃ tathyamidaṃ svabharturdadāmi sarvaṃ ca gṛhāṇa subhru // NarP_2,31.59 //
GP12nardp2_u:3581: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇottarabhāge mohinīcarite kāṣṭhīlopākhyāne māghamāhātmyaṃ nāmaikatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp2_u:3584: uvāca tatparā svīye kārye mohakaraṇḍikā // NarP_2,32.1 //
GP12nardp2_u:3588: dehi putraśiroḥ mahyaṃ yadiṣṭaṃ hṛdayādhikam // NarP_2,32.3 //
GP12nardp2_u:3590: tadā svahaste saṃgṛhya khaḍgaṃ rājā patistava // NarP_2,32.4 //
GP12nardp2_u:3594: etadvā kurutadbhadre yadānnaṃ na bhunakti ca // NarP_2,32.6 //
GP12nardp2_u:3596: tacchrutvā vacanaṃ tasyā mohinyāḥ kaṭukākṣaram // NarP_2,32.7 //
GP12nardp2_u:3597: pracakaṃpe kṣaṇaṃ devī śītārtā kadalī yathā /
GP12nardp2_u:3600: śrūyante hi purāṇeṣu gāthāḥ subhru samīritāḥ // NarP_2,32.9 //
GP12nardp2_u:3602: dhanaṃ tyajettyajeddārāñjīvitaṃ ca gṛhaṃ tyajet // NarP_2,32.10 //
GP12nardp2_u:3603: tyajeddeśaṃ tathā bhūpaṃ svargaṃ mitraṃ guruṃ tyajet /
GP12nardp2_u:3610: dvādaśyāstu prabhāveṇa sarvaṃ kṣemaṃ bhaviṣyati // NarP_2,32.14 //
GP12nardp2_u:3612: viśvāsaṃ kuru me vākye sukhinī bhava śobhane // NarP_2,32.15 //
GP12nardp2_u:3614: kathayiṣyāmi te bhadre sāvadhānā śruṇuṣva me // NarP_2,32.16 //
GP12nardp2_u:3618: pādodakaṃ tasya subhru bhaktyā pibati hṛṣṭadhīḥ // NarP_2,32.18 //
GP12nardp2_u:3622: ekadā śakramukhyāste devāḥ samantrya vākpatim // NarP_2,32.20 //
GP12nardp2_u:3624: tacchrutvā vacanaṃ teṣāṃ devānāṃ gururabravīt // NarP_2,32.21 //
GP12nardp2_u:3628: tatra gatvā suraśreṣṭhaṃ vaikuṇṭhaṃ tuṣṭuvuḥ stavaiḥ // NarP_2,32.23 //
GP12nardp2_u:3643: kumārāya gaṇeśāya nandine bhṛṅgiṇe namaḥ // NarP_2,32.30 //
GP12nardp2_u:3645: jagannāthāya nāthāya namo rāmeśvarāya ca // NarP_2,32.31 //
GP12nardp2_u:3653: jayāya jayine netre niyamāya kriyātmane // NarP_2,32.35 //
GP12nardp2_u:3657: śaṅkhine gadine caiva namaścakradharāya ca // NarP_2,32.37 //
GP12nardp2_u:3666: tadvidhatsvākhilādhāra yathā hi sukhino vayam // NarP_2,32.41 //
GP12nardp2_u:3668: tacchrutvā stavanaṃ teṣāṃ vaikuṇṭhaḥ prītamānasaḥ // NarP_2,32.42 //
GP12nardp2_u:3670: te dṛṣṭvā devadeveśaṃ vaikuṇṭhaṃ snigdhamānasam // NarP_2,32.43 //
GP12nardp2_u:3672: tacchrutvā śakramukhyānāṃ kāryaṃ kāryavidāṃ varaḥ // NarP_2,32.44 //
GP12nardp2_u:3677: taṃ tu dṛṣṭvā viśālākṣī brāhmaṇaṃ hṛṣṭamānasā /
GP12nardp2_u:3678: apūrvaṃ bhaktibhāvena dadau satkṛtya cāsanam // NarP_2,32.47 //
GP12nardp2_u:3680: nāhaṃ samādade devi tvaddattaṃ paramāsanam // NarP_2,32.48 //
GP12nardp2_u:3682: yanme manogataṃ kāryaṃ tadvijñāya ca mānini // NarP_2,32.49 //
GP12nardp2_u:3687: yatte manogataṃ vipra taddāsyāmi gṛhāṇame // NarP_2,32.51 //
GP12nardp2_u:3689: ityuktaḥ sa dvijaḥ prāha na pratyemi striyā vacaḥ // NarP_2,32.52 //
GP12nardp2_u:3690: tava bhartā yadi vadettadā me pratyayo bhavet /
GP12nardp2_u:3697: yadā tu jagṛhe naiva dattamāsanamādarāt // NarP_2,32.56 //
GP12nardp2_u:3701: aṅgīkṛte tu daityena tadvijñāya ca mānasam // NarP_2,32.58 //
GP12nardp2_u:3703: tatastu daṃpatī tatra mugdhau svakṛtayā śucā // NarP_2,32.59 //
GP12nardp2_u:3705: gṛhāṇa jīvitaṃ vipra dehi pādodakaṃ mama // NarP_2,32.60 //
GP12nardp2_u:3707: tatastu vipraḥ protātmā tadaṅgīkṛtya cāsanam // NarP_2,32.61 //
GP12nardp2_u:3708: pādodakaṃ dadau tasyai bhaktyā prīto janārdanaḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:3709: prakṣālya pādau viprasya viśālākṣī mudānvitā // NarP_2,32.62 //
GP12nardp2_u:3710: patyā saha dadhau mūrdhni apaḥ pādāvanejanīḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:3711: tatastu sahasā subhru daṃpatī divyarūpiṇau // NarP_2,32.63 //
GP12nardp2_u:3713: tataḥ prasanno bhagavān devaśalyaṃ vimocya saḥ // NarP_2,32.64 //
GP12nardp2_u:3715: evaṃ mayāpi dātavyaṃ tava devi pratiśrutam // NarP_2,32.65 //
GP12nardp2_u:3718: satyācccutaṃ manuṣyaṃ hi śvapākādadhamaṃ viduḥ // NarP_2,32.67 //
GP12nardp2_u:3720: jagrāha bhartuścaraṇau sutāmnau raktāṅgulī pāṇiyugena subhrūḥ // NarP_2,32.68 //
GP12nardp2_u:3721: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇottarabhāge mohinīcarite saṃdhyāvalīkathanaṃ nāma dvātriṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp2_u:3723: saṃdhyāvalī tataḥ pādau bhartuḥ saṃgṛhya bhūpate /
GP12nardp2_u:3724: uvāca vacanaṃ devī dharmāṃ gadavināśanam // NarP_2,33.1 //
GP12nardp2_u:3727: bhojanaṃ vāsare viṣṇorvadhaṃ vā tanayasya vai /
GP12nardp2_u:3729: yādṛśī hi jananyāstu pīḍā bhavati bhūpate /
GP12nardp2_u:3732: māturbhavati bhūpāla tathā nahi bhavetpituḥ // NarP_2,33.5 //
GP12nardp2_u:3734: jananī dhāriṇī kliṣṭā varddhane pālane 'dhikā // NarP_2,33.6 //
GP12nardp2_u:3735: pituḥ śataguṇaḥ sneho mātuḥ putre pravartate /
GP12nardp2_u:3736: snehādhikyaṃ tu saṃprekṣya mātaraṃ mahatīṃ viduḥ // NarP_2,33.7 //
GP12nardp2_u:3739: vyāpādaya sutaṃ bhūpa snehaṃ tyaktvā sudūrataḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:3740: mā satyalaṅghanaṃ kārṣīḥ śāpito 'si mayātmanā // NarP_2,33.9 //
GP12nardp2_u:3742: yasmiṃścīrṇe rujā dehe nālpāpi nṛpa jāyate // NarP_2,33.10 //
GP12nardp2_u:3744: prāṇānādāya putraṃ vā sarvasvaṃ vā mahīpate // NarP_2,33.11 //
GP12nardp2_u:3745: yaścānuvartate daivaṃ sa pumān gīyate mahān /
GP12nardp2_u:3746: tā āpado 'pi bhūpāla dhanyā yāḥ satyakārikāḥ // NarP_2,33.12 //
GP12nardp2_u:3750: tadalaṃ paritāpena satyaṃ pālaya bhūpate // NarP_2,33.14 //
GP12nardp2_u:3752: devairutpāditā hyeṣā nikaṣā te vimohinī // NarP_2,33.15 //
GP12nardp2_u:3753: manye bhūpāla sā patnyā kṛtā tāṃ tvaṃ na budhyase /
GP12nardp2_u:3755: teṣāṃ datvā padaṃ mūrdhni yāsyase paramaṃ padam /
GP12nardp2_u:3758: viruddhā vibudhā bhūpa seśvarāstava ceṣṭitaiḥ // NarP_2,33.18 //
GP12nardp2_u:3760: sa tvaṃ bhūpa dṛḍho bhūtvā ghātayasva sutaṃ priyam // NarP_2,33.19 //
GP12nardp2_u:3761: mohinyāḥ kuru vākyaṃ tu ātmanaḥ satyapālanāt // NarP_2,33.20 //
GP12nardp2_u:3762: lupte 'pi vākye bhavitā nṛpeśa pāpaṃ samaṃ brahmavadhena ghoram /
GP12nardp2_u:3763: tantāsi loke śamanasya bhūpa yaśaḥpraṇo bhavitā dharāyām // NarP_2,33.21 //
GP12nardp2_u:3768: ghātayitvā sutaṃ loke kā gatirmme bhaviṣyati // NarP_2,33.23 //
GP12nardp2_u:3769: kva gato mandaraṃ śailaṃ kva prāptā mohinī mayā /
GP12nardp2_u:3772: aprajaṃ ca sutaṃ hatvā kā gatirme bhaviṣyāti // NarP_2,33.25 //
GP12nardp2_u:3775: jambūdvīpamidaṃ bhuktaṃ mayā tu varavarṇini // NarP_2,33.27 //
GP12nardp2_u:3779: yo 'yamatyadhikaḥ putro dharmāṅgada iti kṣitau // NarP_2,33.29 //
GP12nardp2_u:3780: mama vaṃśasya cārvaṅgi kiṃ punarmama mānadaḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:3782: punareva varārohe brūhi tvaṃ vacanaiḥ śubhaiḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:3784: evamuktvā tu nṛpatiḥ priyāṃ sandhyāvalīṃ tadā /
GP12nardp2_u:3786: na bhokṣye vāsare viṣṇorna hiṃsye tanayaṃ śubhe /
GP12nardp2_u:3787: ātmānaṃ dārayiṣyāmi devīṃ sandhyāvalīṃ tathā // NarP_2,33.33 //
GP12nardp2_u:3788: anyadvā dāruṇaṃ karma karomi tava śāsanāt /
GP12nardp2_u:3789: duṣṭāgrahamimaṃ subhru parityaja sutaṃ prati // NarP_2,33.34 //
GP12nardp2_u:3790: kiṃ phalaṃ bhavitā tubhyaṃ hatvā dharmāṅgadaṃ sutam /
GP12nardp2_u:3791: bhojayitvā dine viṣṇoḥ ko lābho bhavitā vada // NarP_2,33.35 //
GP12nardp2_u:3793: anyaṃ yācasva subhage varaṃ tvāṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // NarP_2,33.36 //
GP12nardp2_u:3796: prasādaṃ kuru me devi putrabhikṣāṃ prayaccha me /
GP12nardp2_u:3799: durlabhaṃ hi kule janma durlabhā vaṃśajā priyā // NarP_2,33.39 //
GP12nardp2_u:3801: durlabhā vaiṣṇavī dīkṣā durlabhaḥ smṛtisaṃgrahaḥ // NarP_2,33.40 //
GP12nardp2_u:3807: kṛtaṃ śrāddhaṃ trayodaśyāṃ durlabhaṃ varavarṇini // NarP_2,33.43 //
GP12nardp2_u:3811: durlabhaṃ parvakāle tu snānaṃ śītalavāriṇā // NarP_2,33.45 //
GP12nardp2_u:3813: yathāśāstroditaṃ karma taddevi bhuvi durlabham // NarP_2,33.46 //
GP12nardp2_u:3814: durlabhaṃ kuśalaṃ pathyaṃ durlabhaṃ cauṣadhaṃ tathā /
GP12nardp2_u:3817: evaṃ vaco varārohe kuru me dharmarakṣakam // NarP_2,33.48 //
GP12nardp2_u:3821: adṛṣṭaviṣayaṃ putraṃ nāhaṃ hiṃsye kadācana // NarP_2,33.50 //
GP12nardp2_u:3822: svahasteneha cārvaṅgi kiṃ nu pāpamataḥ param /
GP12nardp2_u:3824: dharmāṅgado na me śatrurnāhaṃ hanmi sutaṃ tava // NarP_2,33.51 //
GP12nardp2_u:3826: vasudhāṃ svecchayā rājaṃstvaṃ śādhi bahuvatsaram // NarP_2,33.52 //
GP12nardp2_u:3828: mama bhūmipate kāryaṃ na putranidhane tava // NarP_2,33.53 //
GP12nardp2_u:3831: satyaṃ saṃrakṣa yatnena kuruṣva vacanaṃ mama /
GP12nardp2_u:3832: evaṃ bruvāṇāṃ tāṃ rājanmohinīṃ tanumadhyamām // NarP_2,33.55 //
GP12nardp2_u:3834: etadeva gṛhāṇa tvaṃ mā śaṅkāṃ kuru bhāmini // NarP_2,33.56 //
GP12nardp2_u:3835: gṛhītvā nirmalaṃ khaṅgaṃ vinyasya nṛpateḥ puraḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:3837: na vilaṃbaḥ pitaḥ kāryastvayā mama nipātane /
GP12nardp2_u:3838: manmāturvacanaṃ satyaṃ kuru bhūpa pratiśrutam // NarP_2,33.58 //
GP12nardp2_u:3846: piturarthe hatā ye tu māturarthe hatāstathā // NarP_2,33.62 //
GP12nardp2_u:3848: bhūmyarthe pārthivārthe vā devatārthe tathaiva ca // NarP_2,33.63 //
GP12nardp2_u:3850: tadalaṃ paritāpena jahi māṃ tvaṃ varāsinā // NarP_2,33.64 //
GP12nardp2_u:3851: satyaṃ pālaya rājendra mā bhuṅkṣva harivāsare /
GP12nardp2_u:3852: dharmārthe tanayaṃ hanyādbhāryāṃ vāpi mahīpate // NarP_2,33.65 //
GP12nardp2_u:3854: aśvameghe makhavare na doṣo jāyate nṛpa // NarP_2,33.66 //
GP12nardp2_u:3856: tattvayā hyavicāreṇa karttavyaṃ vacanaṃ dhruvam // NarP_2,33.67 //
GP12nardp2_u:3857: prasīda rājendra kuruṣva vākyaṃ mayeritaṃ cātmavadhāya satyam /
GP12nardp2_u:3859: vadhena te bhūmipate sutasya yaśaḥ prakāśaṃ gamayiṣyate ca /
GP12nardp2_u:3860: yaśaḥ pkāśādbhavitā hi kīrtistathākṣayā tāta na saṃśayo 'tra // NarP_2,33.69 //
GP12nardp2_u:3866: mā bhuṅkṣva tanayaṃ hiṃsa cetyāgrahasamanvitam // NarP_2,34.2 //
GP12nardp2_u:3870: dharmāṅgadasya vīrasya tasya rukmāṅgadasya tu // NarP_2,34.4 //
GP12nardp2_u:3872: vacane bhuṅkṣva bhuṅkṣveti mohinyā vyāhṛte tadā // NarP_2,34.5 //
GP12nardp2_u:3873: jagrāha vimalaṃ khaṅgaṃ hantuṃ dharmāṅgadaṃ sutam /
GP12nardp2_u:3875: taṃ dṛṣṭvā khaṅgahastaṃ tu pitaraṃ dharmmaṃbhūṣaṇaḥ // NarP_2,34.6 //
GP12nardp2_u:3877: vadanaṃ prekṣya cādīnaṃ jananyā nṛpapuṅgavaḥ // NarP_2,34.7 //
GP12nardp2_u:3879: kaṃbugrīvāṃ samānāṃ tu suvarṇā sukomalām // NarP_2,34.8 //
GP12nardp2_u:3883: gṛhītakhaṅge jagadīśanāthe cacāla pṛthvīṃ sanagā samagrā // NarP_2,34.10 //
GP12nardp2_u:3884: siṃdhuḥ pravṛddhaśca babhūva sadyo nimajja nārthaṃ bhuvanatrayasya /
GP12nardp2_u:3885: nipeturulkāḥ śataśo dharāyāṃ nirghātayuktāḥ sataḍitkhamadhyāt // NarP_2,34.11 //
GP12nardp2_u:3886: vivarṇarūpā ca babhūva mohinī na devakāryaṃ hi kṛtaṃ mayeti /
GP12nardp2_u:3887: nirarthakaṃ janma mamādhunābhūtkṛtaṃ tu daivena dajagadvidhāyinā // NarP_2,34.12 //
GP12nardp2_u:3888: vimohanaṃ rūpamidaṃ viḍaṃbanaṃ yadbhūmipālena na bhuktamannam /
GP12nardp2_u:3889: harerdine pāpabhayāpahe tu tṛṇaiḥ samāhaṃ bhavitā triviṣṭape // NarP_2,34.13 //
GP12nardp2_u:3890: satvādhiko yāsyati mokṣamārgaṃ gantāsmi pāpa narakaṃ sudāruṇam // NarP_2,34.14 //
GP12nardp2_u:3895: sakuṇḍalaṃ cāru śaśiprakāśaṃ bhrājiṣṇu vaktraṃ tanayasya bhūpaḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:3898: tuṣṭo 'smi tuṣṭo 'smi na saṃśayo 'tra gacchasva lokaṃ mama lokanātha // NarP_2,34.18 //
GP12nardp2_u:3900: trailokyapūjyāṃ vimalāṃ ca śuklāṃ kṛtvā padaṃ mūrdhni yamasya bhūpa // NarP_2,34.19 //
GP12nardp2_u:3901: prayāhi vāsaṃ mama dehasaṃjñaṃ sa cakriṇo bhūmipatiḥ kareṇa /
GP12nardp2_u:3902: saṃspṛṣṭamātro virajā babhūva priyāsametastanayena yuktaḥ // NarP_2,34.20 //
GP12nardp2_u:3903: upetya vegena jagāma dehaṃ devasya divyaṃ sa nṛpo mahātmā /
GP12nardp2_u:3904: vihāya lakṣmīmavanīprasūtāṃ vihāya dāsīḥsudhanaṃ sa kośam // NarP_2,34.21 //
GP12nardp2_u:3906: jagāma dehaṃ madhusūdanasya tatoṃ'barātpuṣpacayaḥ papāta // NarP_2,34.22 //
GP12nardp2_u:3908: rājan jagurgītamatīva ramyaṃ devāṅganāḥ saṃnanṛturmudānvitāḥ // NarP_2,34.23 //
GP12nardp2_u:3910: harestanau bhūmipatiṃ praviṣṭaṃ sadāraputraṃ svalipiṃ pramārjya // NarP_2,34.24 //
GP12nardp2_u:3912: bhītaḥ punaḥ prāpya pitāmahāntikaṃ provāca devaṃ caturānanaṃ rudan // NarP_2,34.25 //
GP12nardp2_u:3913: nāhaṃ niyogī bhavitā hi deva ājñāvihīnaḥ suralokanātha /
GP12nardp2_u:3914: vidhehi cānyatprakaromi tāta nideśanaṃ māstu madīya daṇḍam // NarP_2,34.26 //
GP12nardp2_u:3915: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇottarabhāge mohinīcarite sutavadhodyatasya rukmāṅgadasya bhagavaddarśanaṃ nāma catustriṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp2_u:3918: mohinī niṣphalā jātā vandhyā strī janane yathā // NarP_2,35.1 //
GP12nardp2_u:3920: lokaḥ prayāti vaikuṃṇṭhaṃ na māṃ kaścitprapadyate // NarP_2,35.2 //
GP12nardp2_u:3922: tathāpi sarvabhūtānāṃ na buddhiḥ parivartate // NarP_2,35.3 //
GP12nardp2_u:3924: prayānti paramaṃ lokaṃ luptapāpāḥ pitāmaha // NarP_2,35.4 //
GP12nardp2_u:3925: putrī te vrīḍitā devī mohinī mohamāgatā /
GP12nardp2_u:3926: nāyāti tava sāmīpyaṃ na bhuṅkte lokagarhitā // NarP_2,35.5 //
GP12nardp2_u:3927: nirvyāpārastvahaṃ jātaḥ kiṃ karomi praśādhi mām /
GP12nardp2_u:3932: tato deva gaṇāḥ sarve śatakratupurogamāḥ // NarP_2,35.8 //
GP12nardp2_u:3934: samāyātā mahīpāla nārīṃ tāṃ pratibodhitum // NarP_2,35.9 //
GP12nardp2_u:3938: parājito yathā martyaḥ pralmānakusumaṃ yathā // NarP_2,35.11 //
GP12nardp2_u:3942: manthānaṃ navanīte vā uddhṛte dharaṇīpate // NarP_2,35.13 //
GP12nardp2_u:3943: asaṃskṛtā yathā vāṇī marditā ca yathā camūm /
GP12nardp2_u:3944: hata nāthāṃ tu yuvatīṃ dhānyahīnāṃ prajāṃ yathā // NarP_2,35.14 //
GP12nardp2_u:3945: mantrahīnavidhiṃ yuddhaṃ dharmaṃ ca dayayā vinā /
GP12nardp2_u:3946: pṛthvīṃ bhūpālahīnā vā mantrahī yathā nṛpa // NarP_2,35.15 //
GP12nardp2_u:3948: jalahīnaṃ yathā kuṃbhaṃ paṅkasthaṃ gopatiṃ yathā // NarP_2,35.16 //
GP12nardp2_u:3949: gṛhasthaṃ bhāryayā hīnaṃ rāṣṭrabhraṣṭaṃ ca bhūpatim /
GP12nardp2_u:3950: bhagnakriyaṃ yathā vaidyaṃ bhagnaśākhaṃ yathā drumam // NarP_2,35.17 //
GP12nardp2_u:3951: tejohīnaṃ yathāgāraṃ nirjalaṃ vā ghanaṃ yathā /
GP12nardp2_u:3953: matibhraṣṭo yathā martyaḥ parvasaṃgī yathā naraḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:3954: atṛptaḥ kāntayā kāntaḥ pannagaśca viṣojjhitaḥ // NarP_2,35.19 //
GP12nardp2_u:3955: lūnapakṣo yathā pakṣī vṛttihīno yathā dvijaḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:3956: śirobhraṣṭā yathā mālā parvato dhātuvarjitaḥ // NarP_2,35.20 //
GP12nardp2_u:3958: svarahīnaṃ yathā sāma padmahīnaṃ yathā saraḥ // NarP_2,35.21 //
GP12nardp2_u:3959: yathā mārgaṃ tṛṇai ruddhaṃ padmaṃ patravivarjitam /
GP12nardp2_u:3960: jñānaṃ mamatvasaṃyuktaṃ pumāṃsaṃ prakṛtiṃ vinā // NarP_2,35.22 //
GP12nardp2_u:3962: tejohīnāṃ tathāpaśyan mohinīṃ te divaukasaḥ // NarP_2,35.23 //
GP12nardp2_u:3967: māṃ śokaṃ kuru vāmoru pauruṣaṃ hi tvayā kṛtam /
GP12nardp2_u:3970: tanna siddhaṃ varārohe sa prayāto 'dhunābhavam // NarP_2,35.27 //
GP12nardp2_u:3972: ekādaśī mahāpuṇyā mohinī mādhave site // NarP_2,35.28 //
GP12nardp2_u:3975: vighnarājñī tu vai nārī lokeṣu parigīyate /
GP12nardp2_u:3976: karmaṇā manasā vācā putravyāpādane matim // NarP_2,35.30 //
GP12nardp2_u:3977: kṛtvā coddhṛtya khaṅgaṃ ca tyaktvā snehaṃ sudūrurataḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:3979: haniṣyati priyaṃ putraṃ na bhuṅkte harivāsare /
GP12nardp2_u:3980: putrasya ca priyāyāśca bhāvaṃ prekṣya nṛpasya ca // NarP_2,35.32 //
GP12nardp2_u:3983: phalaṃ karmaṇi cārabdhe yadi devī na siddhyati /
GP12nardp2_u:3984: sarvayatnena subhage doṣaḥ ko 'tra tavādhunā // NarP_2,35.34 //
GP12nardp2_u:3985: etasmād varadāḥ sarve saṃprāptā vibudhāḥ śubhe /
GP12nardp2_u:3986: siddhau vāpyatha vāsiddhau karmakṛtsyāddṛthā na hi // NarP_2,35.35 //
GP12nardp2_u:3988: sadbhāve ghaṭamānasya yadi karma na siddhyati // NarP_2,35.36 //
GP12nardp2_u:3989: deyaṃ vetanamātraṃ tu na ca tuṣṭiphalaṃ bhavet /
GP12nardp2_u:3990: yo na tasmai prayaccheta jīvanaṃ jīvanāya vai // NarP_2,35.37 //
GP12nardp2_u:3991: govadhaṃ samavāpnoti sa naro nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:3992: tasmād deyaṃ varārohe abhīṣṭaṃ varasundari // NarP_2,35.38 //
GP12nardp2_u:3994: kiṃ na kurvanti vibudhās tvayā saha varānane // NarP_2,35.39 //
GP12nardp2_u:3995: dvādaśyās tejasā bhagnā yām āhur vighranāśinīm /
GP12nardp2_u:3996: vibudhair evam uktā tu mohinī lokamohinī // NarP_2,35.40 //
GP12nardp2_u:3998: dhigidaṃ jīvitaṃ mahyaṃ yena kāryaṃ na sādhitam // NarP_2,35.41 //
GP12nardp2_u:4000: na tu luptaṃ haridinaṃ na bhuktaṃ harivāsare // NarP_2,35.42 //
GP12nardp2_u:4001: bhūbhujā tena vīreṇa kṛtaḥ putravadho mudā /
GP12nardp2_u:4002: gato mūrdhni padaṃ datvā mama rukmāṅgado harim // NarP_2,35.43 //
GP12nardp2_u:4004: haṃsaṃ śucipadaṃ vyoma praṇavaṃ bījamavyayam // NarP_2,35.44 //
GP12nardp2_u:4007: asti nāstīti yaṃ prāhurna dūre nāpi cāntike /
GP12nardp2_u:4008: paraṃ dhāma manogrāhyaṃ puruṣākhyaṃ jaganmayam // NarP_2,35.46 //
GP12nardp2_u:4010: tasmiṃl layam anuprāpte kiṃ nu me jīvite phalam // NarP_2,35.47 //
GP12nardp2_u:4011: asādhite tu yaḥ kārye naro gṛhṇāti vetanam /
GP12nardp2_u:4012: svāminaṃ tu parityajya prayāti narakaṃ dhruvam // NarP_2,35.48 //
GP12nardp2_u:4013: na sādhayanti ye kāryaṃ svāmināṃ tu divaukasaḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:4014: bhṛtyā vetanabhoktāro jāyante bhūtale hayāḥ // NarP_2,35.49 //
GP12nardp2_u:4016: kathaṃ varaṃ tu gṛhṇāmi bhavatāṃ nākavāsinām // NarP_2,35.50 //
GP12nardp2_u:4018: brūhi mohini dāsyāmi yatte hṛdi samīhitam /
GP12nardp2_u:4019: anṛṇāstu bhaviṣyāmaḥ kṛtvā copakṛtiṃ tava // NarP_2,35.51 //
GP12nardp2_u:4021: tasya tvaṃ phalabhāgdevi tādṛśārthe kṛtasya tu // NarP_2,35.52 //
GP12nardp2_u:4025: dvādaśābde tataḥ pūrṇe nirgato jalamadhyataḥ // NarP_2,35.54 //
GP12nardp2_u:4031: bhavanto yacca dātāro mohinyā vāñchitaṃ varam // NarP_2,35.57 //
GP12nardp2_u:4033: nāsmā hi loke bhavatīha śuddhiḥ samiddhavahnau patane 'pi devāḥ // NarP_2,35.58 //
GP12nardp2_u:4035: na cāpi cāsyā bhavatīha śuddhiḥ samidbhavahnau patane 'pi devāḥ” // NarP_2,35.59 //
GP12nardp2_u:4037: priyāyutaṃ mokṣapadaṃ nihatya cakāra bhūmiṃ nṛpavarjitāṃ ca // NarP_2,35.59 //
GP12nardp2_u:4038: na cāpi vāso narakeṣu devā asyāḥ sthitiḥ kka tridive 'lpabuddheḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:4039: na cāpi rājño nikaṭe ca devā nāpyetu viṣṇoḥ padamavyayaṃ yat // NarP_2,35.60 //
GP12nardp2_u:4040: na lokavādena vidūṣitāyā lokeṣu kutrāpi bhavecca vāsaḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:4041: dhirajīvanaṃ kargmavigarhitāyā devāḥ sadā pāpasamāratāyāḥ // NarP_2,35.61 //
GP12nardp2_u:4042: patiṃ hatvā sutaṃ hatvā sapatnīṃ jananīsamām /
GP12nardp2_u:4043: hatvā dharāṃ samastāṃ vā kāṃ gatiṃ yāsyate surāḥ // NarP_2,35.62 //
GP12nardp2_u:4048: apeyaṃ pīyatā muktvā kathaṃ vāsaṃ labheddivi /
GP12nardp2_u:4049: etadajñānināṃ proktaṃ jñānanāṃ tu na nirṇayaḥ // NarP_2,35.65 //
GP12nardp2_u:4055: vyāhṛte kathitaṃ vipraiḥ seyamadya suniṣṭhurā // NarP_2,35.68 //
GP12nardp2_u:4057: bharturvākyaṃ vyapohyaiva ghātayitvā sutaṃ priyam // NarP_2,35.69 //
GP12nardp2_u:4058: vākyajñaṃ vākyanirataṃ mātṝṇāṃ tu hite ratam /
GP12nardp2_u:4063: dharmādhārāḥ smṛtā devā dharmo vedesamāsthitaḥ // NarP_2,35.72 //
GP12nardp2_u:4064: vedaiḥ śuśrūṣaṇaṃ bhartuḥ strīṇāṃ dharmaḥ prakīrtitaḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:4067: śuśrūṣā sā hi vijñeyā na śuśrūṣā hi sevanam // NarP_2,35.74 //
GP12nardp2_u:4072: tena mokṣaṃ gato rājā pāpamasyāṃ visṛjya ca // NarP_2,35.76 //
GP12nardp2_u:4081: yo 'syāḥ pakṣetu varteta devo vā dānavo 'pi vā // NarP_2,35.81 //
GP12nardp2_u:4083: mohinyā rakṣaṇe yastu prayatnaṃ kurute surāḥ // NarP_2,35.82 //
GP12nardp2_u:4084: tasya tajjāyate pāpaṃ yanmohinyāṃ vyavasthitam // NarP_2,35.83 //
GP12nardp2_u:4085: sa evamuktvā nṛpate dvijendraḥ saṃgṛhya pāṇau salilaṃ ca tīvram /
GP12nardp2_u:4086: krodhena saṃvīkṣya vidhiprasūtāṃ cikṣepa tanmūrghnyanalaprakāśam // NarP_2,35.84 //
GP12nardp2_u:4087: nikṣiptamātre salile mahīpa sadyaḥ prajajvāla ca taccharīram /
GP12nardp2_u:4088: saṃpaśyatāṃ nākanivāsināṃ tu tṛṇyā yathā vahniśikhāvalīḍhā // NarP_2,35.85 //
GP12nardp2_u:4089: kopaṃ vibho saṃhara saṃhareti yāvadgiraḥ khe marutāṃ babhūvuḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:4090: tāvatsa vahnirdvijavākyamṛṣṭo bhasmāvaśeṣāṃ pramadāṃ cakāra // NarP_2,35.86 //
GP12nardp2_u:4091: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇottarabhāge mohinī carite śāpaprāptirnāma pañcatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp2_u:4094: bhartsitā devadūtena sthitiste 'tra na pāpinī // NarP_2,36.1 //
GP12nardp2_u:4097: dharmato vimukhānāṃ ca narake vāsa iṣyate /
GP12nardp2_u:4098: evamuktvā tu tāṃ vāyuḥ krūraṃ vacanapadbhutam // NarP_2,36.3 //
GP12nardp2_u:4100: evaṃ saṃtāḍitā rājan devadūtena mohinī // NarP_2,36.4 //
GP12nardp2_u:4102: tatra dharmājñayā sā tu dūtaiḥ saṃtāḍitā ciram // NarP_2,36.5 //
GP12nardp2_u:4104: pāpe dharmāṅgadaḥ putro ghātitaḥ patipāṇinā // NarP_2,36.6 //
GP12nardp2_u:4108: prākṛtasyāpi putrasya hiṃsāyāṃ brahmahā bhavet // NarP_2,36.8 //
GP12nardp2_u:4113: jvalitāṅgā babhūvustā dhāraṇāya na tu kṣamāḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:4116: devadeva jagannātha dharmarāja dayāṃ kuru // NarP_2,36.12 //
GP12nardp2_u:4117: imāṃ niḥsārayāśu tvaṃ yātanābhyaḥ sukhāya naḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:4118: yasyāḥ sparśanato nātha bhasmabhūtāḥ kṣaṇādaho // NarP_2,36.13 //
GP12nardp2_u:4122: yo brahmadaṇḍanirdagdhaḥ pumān strī vā ca taskaraḥ // NarP_2,36.15 //
GP12nardp2_u:4123: tasya pāpasya saṃsparśaṃ necchati yātanā mama /
GP12nardp2_u:4126: niḥsārayata me bāpi deho jvalati darśaṃnāt // NarP_2,36.17 //
GP12nardp2_u:4129: tataḥ sā duḥkhitā rājan mohinī mohasaṃyutā /
GP12nardp2_u:4132: janakasyāntikaṃ gatvā duḥkhaṃ svaṃ saṃnyavedayat // NarP_2,36.20 //
GP12nardp2_u:4133: tāta tannāsti me sthānaṃ trailokye sacarā care /
GP12nardp2_u:4134: yatra yatra tu gacchāmi tatra tatra kṣipanti mām // NarP_2,36.21 //
GP12nardp2_u:4138: kleśayitvā tu bhartāraṃ putraṃ hatvā varāsinā // NarP_2,36.23 //
GP12nardp2_u:4139: saṃdhyāvalīṃ kṣobhayitvā pitaḥ prāptā daśā mimām /
GP12nardp2_u:4140: na gatirvidyate deva pāpāyā mama sāṃpratam // NarP_2,36.24 //
GP12nardp2_u:4145: yadi tvaṃ tridaśaiḥ sārddhaṃ vipraṃ taṃ śāpadāyinam /
GP12nardp2_u:4146: prasādayasi matprītyā tarhi me vihitā gatiḥ // NarP_2,36.27 //
GP12nardp2_u:4150: tatra gatvā mahīpāla brahmā devādibhirvṛtaḥ // NarP_2,36.29 //
GP12nardp2_u:4152: bhūpa rudrādidevaistu pūjyo mānyaḥ pitāmahaḥ // NarP_2,36.30 //
GP12nardp2_u:4154: kārye mahati saṃprāpte hyasādhye bhuvanatraye // NarP_2,36.31 //
GP12nardp2_u:4160: tataḥ prasanno bhagavān lokakarttā jagadguruḥ // NarP_2,36.34 //
GP12nardp2_u:4165: sutā me yamalokaṃ tu śūnyaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca mānada /
GP12nardp2_u:4166: vaikuṇṭhaṃ saṃkulaṃ prekṣya lokaiḥ sarvairni rākulaiḥ // NarP_2,36.37 //
GP12nardp2_u:4174: devāpakāro viprarṣe na kṣamo bāhujanmanā // NarP_2,36.41 //
GP12nardp2_u:4176: na prāpyate sāṅghyavidā tu yacca nāṣṭāṅgayogena tu bhaktigamyam /
GP12nardp2_u:4177: tatprāpitaṃ bhūsura bhūpabharturnijasya putrasya tathā sapatnyāḥ // NarP_2,36.43 //
GP12nardp2_u:4179: tatpāpavegena babhūva vidrutā bhasmāvaśeṣā tava śāpadagdhā // NarP_2,36.44 //
GP12nardp2_u:4181: na svārthakāmā labhate 'vamānaṃ kathaṃ dvijāto 'pakṛtiṃ kṣamasva // NarP_2,36.45 //
GP12nardp2_u:4182: dayāṃ kuruṣva praśamaṃ bhajasva piṣṭasya peṣo nahi nītiyuktaḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:4184: yasminkṛte brāhmaṇa mohinīyaṃ buddhiṃ tyajetkrūratarāṃ tvayījye // NarP_2,36.46 //
GP12nardp2_u:4185: sa evamuktaḥ kamalāsanena vimṛśya buddhyā visasarja kopam /
GP12nardp2_u:4186: uvāca devaṃ tridaśādhināthaṃ vimohinīdehakṛtaṃ dvijendraḥ // NarP_2,36.47 //
GP12nardp2_u:4188: na lokeṣu sthitistasmātprāṇibhiḥ saṃkuleṣu ca // NarP_2,36.48 //
GP12nardp2_u:4190: taddāsyami tava prītyā tvaṃ hi pūjyataro mama // NarP_2,36.49 //
GP12nardp2_u:4191: yathā tava vacaḥ satyaṃ mama cāpi sureśvara /
GP12nardp2_u:4192: devakāryaṃ ca bhavitā mohinīkṛtatyameva ca // NarP_2,36.50 //
GP12nardp2_u:4198: tato brahmā suraiḥ sarvaiḥ saṃmantrya nṛpasattama // NarP_2,36.53 //
GP12nardp2_u:4199: uvāca mohinīṃ devīṃ nāsti sthānaṃ tava kvacit /
GP12nardp2_u:4206: ekādaśyāḥ prabhāveṇa sarveṣāṃ pāpināṃ gatiḥ // NarP_2,36.57 //
GP12nardp2_u:4207: sādhyate tāṃ suraśreṣṭhā vardhituṃ me prayojanam /
GP12nardp2_u:4208: patiḥ sapatnī putraśca mayā vaikuṇṭhagāḥ kṛtāḥ // NarP_2,36.58 //
GP12nardp2_u:4210: yathā haridinaṃ duṣṭaṃ jāyate mama mānadāḥ // NarP_2,36.59 //
GP12nardp2_u:4211: etatprayāce dadata svārthārthaṃ taddhi nānyathā // NarP_2,36.60 //
GP12nardp2_u:4215: yayā pūtā mahāpāpā gacchanti harimandiram // NarP_2,37.1 //
GP12nardp2_u:4216: tatsamīpe mama sthānaṃ yuktaṃ bhāti vicāryatām /
GP12nardp2_u:4222: tāstu hyekādaśībhinnā upoṣyante ca vaiṣṇavaiḥ // NarP_2,37.4 //
GP12nardp2_u:4224: nityaṃ pakṣadvaye proktaṃ vidhinā tridinātmake // NarP_2,37.5 //
GP12nardp2_u:4226: ekādaśī yadā bhinnā upoṣyā hi pare 'hani /
GP12nardp2_u:4227: dvādaśyāṃ hi vrataṃ kāryaṃ niraṃbu samupoṣaṇam // NarP_2,37.6 //
GP12nardp2_u:4228: laṅghane tvasamarthānāṃ jalaṃ śākaṃ phalaṃ payaḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:4229: naivedyaṃ vā hareḥ proktaṃ svāhārātpādasaṃmitam // NarP_2,37.7 //
GP12nardp2_u:4231: niṣkāmā madhyarātre ca viddhāṃ muñcanti yāmyayā // NarP_2,37.8 //
GP12nardp2_u:4232: sarveṣvapi tu lokeṣu viditā daśamī tithiḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:4233: yamasya tasyāḥ prānti tu sthitiḥ kāryā tvayānaghe // NarP_2,37.9 //
GP12nardp2_u:4234: etena devakāryaṃ ca siddhaṃ bhavati śobhane /
GP12nardp2_u:4236: bhuvi tīrthāni caiva tvaṃ svāghanāśāya saṃcara /
GP12nardp2_u:4239: yaḥ kaścitkurute viddhaṃ tvayā hyekādaśīvratam // NarP_2,37.12 //
GP12nardp2_u:4242: mūhūrtāḥ pañcadaśa ca smṛtā rātrerdinasya ca /
GP12nardp2_u:4245: sabdhvopavāsināṃ puṇyaṃ svasthā bhava śucismite // NarP_2,37.15 //
GP12nardp2_u:4248: dattaṃ te mohini sthānaṃ pratyūṣasamayāṅkitam // NarP_2,37.17 //
GP12nardp2_u:4249: viddhaṃ tvayaikādaśikāvrataṃ ye kurvanti kartāra iha prayatnāt /
GP12nardp2_u:4250: teṣāṃ bhavedyatsukṛtaṃ śubhe phalaṃ bhuṅkṣva prasannā bhava bhūsure tvam // NarP_2,37.18 //
GP12nardp2_u:4251: evaṃ pradiṣṭā kamalāsanādyaiḥ sā mohinī hṛṣṭatarā babhūva /
GP12nardp2_u:4252: mene kṛtārthaṃ nijajīvitaṃ ca svapāpatīrthābhiniṣevaṇena // NarP_2,37.19 //
GP12nardp2_u:4253: saṃsādhitaṃ kāryamidaṃ surāṇāṃ bhasmāvaśeṣaṃ hi gate 'pi dehe /
GP12nardp2_u:4254: caitanyamātre pavanātmake 'smin saṃmārjito bhūpakṛtastu panthāḥ // NarP_2,37.20 //
GP12nardp2_u:4255: nītaṃ mayā cātmakṛtaṃ hi vākyaṃ prahṛṣṭayā vai yadudāhṛtaṃ hi /
GP12nardp2_u:4256: evaṃ vimṛśya kṣiptipālade vānpraṇamya hṛṣṭā ca purodhasaṃ svam // NarP_2,37.21 //
GP12nardp2_u:4257: prānte sthitā sūryavihīnasaṃjñe kāle daśamyā janamohanāya /
GP12nardp2_u:4258: kṛcchrāntarūpā ca dinaṃ ca bhuṅkte prakṛṣṭarūpā narakāya nṝṇām // NarP_2,37.22 //
GP12nardp2_u:4259: prāntasthitāṃ tāṃ ravijo nirīkṣya prahṛṣṭavaktro vacanaṃ jagāda /
GP12nardp2_u:4260: tvayā pratiṣṭhā mama cārunetre kṛtātra loke punareva samyak /
GP12nardp2_u:4261: vibhodito rukmavibhūṣaṇasya mattebhasaṃsthaḥ paṭahaḥ sughaiṣaḥ // NarP_2,37.23 //
GP12nardp2_u:4262: dṛṣṭe kārye janaḥ sarvaḥ pratyayaṃ kurute tviti // NarP_2,37.24 //
GP12nardp2_u:4263: sūryodaya spṛṣā hyeṣā daśamī garhitā sadā /
GP12nardp2_u:4265: vihāya tāṃ yatpriyayogabhuktiṃ pādasthitā sāpi hyadṛṣyarūpā /
GP12nardp2_u:4266: satyaṃ hi te nāma viśālanetre yanmohinītyeva jano bravīti // NarP_2,37.26 //
GP12nardp2_u:4267: vimohayitvā hi janaṃ samastaṃ paṭe madīye likhitaṃ karoṣi /
GP12nardp2_u:4268: ityeva muktvā tanayo vivasvataḥ praṇamya tāṃ brahmasutāṃ prahṛṣṭaḥ // NarP_2,37.27 //
GP12nardp2_u:4269: jagāma devaiḥ saha nākalokaṃ kare gṛhītvā lipilekhitāram /
GP12nardp2_u:4270: gateṣu deveṣu vimohinī sā brahmāṇamāsādya surāsureśam // NarP_2,37.28 //
GP12nardp2_u:4272: dagdhaṃ śarīraṃ mama lokanātha punaḥ prapatsye 'tha tathā kuruṣva // NarP_2,37.29 //
GP12nardp2_u:4273: vimohitaṃ caiva jaganmayedaṃ prānte samāsthāya yamasya tithyāḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:4274: jito hi rājñā śamanaḥ purādya kṛto jayī tāta tava prabhāvāt // NarP_2,37.30 //
GP12nardp2_u:4276: bhūyāmahaṃ jagannātha brahmaṇaṃ sāṃtyayasva bhoḥ // NarP_2,37.31 //
GP12nardp2_u:4280: tava cāsyā mahābhāga sarvalokahitāya ca // NarP_2,37.33 //
GP12nardp2_u:4282: punaḥ śarīraṃ yāceta tadājñāṃ dehi mānada // NarP_2,37.34 //
GP12nardp2_u:4283: matputrī tava yājyeyaṃ durgatiṃ tāta gacchati /
GP12nardp2_u:4284: tvayā mayā ca sapālyā kṛtakāryā tapasvinī // NarP_2,37.35 //
GP12nardp2_u:4285: yadi tvaṃ śuddhabhāvena māṃ jñāpayasi mānada /
GP12nardp2_u:4288: yathā śuddhyeti viprendra tathaivāśu vidhīyatām // NarP_2,37.37 //
GP12nardp2_u:4289: tacchrutvā vacanaṃ tasya brahmaṇaḥ sa purohitaḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:4293: samukṣite brahmaṇā lokakartrā sā mohinī dehayutā babhūva /
GP12nardp2_u:4294: praṇamya tātaṃ ca vasoḥ purodhaso jagrāha pādau vinayena natvā // NarP_2,37.40 //
GP12nardp2_u:4295: tato vasuryājaka eva rājño mudānvito yājyanitaṃbinīṃ tām /
GP12nardp2_u:4296: vimohinīṃ svāmisutoñjjhitāṃ ca jagāda vākyaṃ vidutāmavīrām // NarP_2,37.41 //
GP12nardp2_u:4300: ityuktvā mohinīṃ vipro brahmāṇāṃ jagatāṃ patim /
GP12nardp2_u:4302: mohinyā vasunā caiva prītyā brahmā visarjitaḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:4305: mohinīṃ samanugrāhyāṃ matvā hṛdi vicārayan // NarP_2,37.45 //
GP12nardp2_u:4306: muhūrttaṃ dhyānamāpanno bubudhe kāraṇaṃ gateḥ // NarP_2,37.46 //
GP12nardp2_u:4310: uvāca ślakṣṇayā vācā sarvalokahite rataḥ // NarP_2,38.1 //
GP12nardp2_u:4312: śṛṇu mohinī vakṣyāmi tīrthānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ pṛthak /
GP12nardp2_u:4315: na tasyā sadṛśaṃ kiñcidvidyate pāpanāśanam // NarP_2,38.3 //
GP12nardp2_u:4316: tacchrutvā vacanaṃ tasya vasoḥ svasya purodhasaḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:4320: sarveṣāṃ ca purāṇānāṃ saṃmataṃ vada sāṃpratam // NarP_2,38.5 //
GP12nardp2_u:4322: paścātpāpavināśinyāṃ snātuṃ yāsye tvayā saha // NarP_2,38.6 //
GP12nardp2_u:4326: te deśāste janapadāste śailā ste 'pi cāśramāḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:4327: yeṣāṃ bhāgīrathī puṇyā samīpe vartate sadā // NarP_2,38.8 //
GP12nardp2_u:4329: tāṃ gatiṃ na labhejjanturgaṅgāṃ saṃsevya yāṃ labhet // NarP_2,38.9 //
GP12nardp2_u:4330: pūrve vayasi pāpāni kṛtvā karmāṇi ye narāḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:4331: śeṣe gaṅgāṃ niṣevante te 'pi yānti parāṃ gatim // NarP_2,38.40 //
GP12nardp2_u:4335: tiṣṭhedyatheṣṭaṃ yaścāpi gaṅgāyāṃ sa viśiṣyate // NarP_2,38.12 //
GP12nardp2_u:4343: devaiḥ seṃdrairmunibhirmānavaiśca niṣevitā sarvakālaṃ samṛddhye // NarP_2,38.16 //
GP12nardp2_u:4344: pakṣādau kṛṣṇapakṣe tu bhūmau saṃnihitā bhavet /
GP12nardp2_u:4345: yāvatpuṇyā hyamāvāsyā dināni daśa mohini // NarP_2,38.17 //
GP12nardp2_u:4347: pātāle sannidhānaṃ tu kurute svayameva hi // NarP_2,38.18 //
GP12nardp2_u:4348: ārabhya śuklaikādaśyā dināni daśa yāni tu /
GP12nardp2_u:4349: pañcamyaṃ tāni sā svarge bhavetsannihitā sadā // NarP_2,38.19 //
GP12nardp2_u:4350: kṛte tu sarvatīrthāni tretāyāṃ puṣkaraṃ param /
GP12nardp2_u:4351: dvāpare tu kurukṣetraṃ kalau gaṅgā viśiṣyate // NarP_2,38.20 //
GP12nardp2_u:4352: kalau tu sarvatīrthāni svaṃ svaṃ vīryaṃ svabhāvataḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:4353: gaṅgāyāṃ pratimuñcanti sā tu devī na kutracit // NarP_2,38.21 //
GP12nardp2_u:4355: pāpaśīlā api narāḥ parāṃ gatimavāpnuyuḥ // NarP_2,38.22 //
GP12nardp2_u:4357: sa eva dravarūpeṇa gaṅgāṃbho nātra saṃśayaḥ // NarP_2,38.23 //
GP12nardp2_u:4358: brahmahā guruḍā goghnaḥ steyī ca gurutalpagaḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:4359: gaṅgāṃbhasā ca pūyante nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // NarP_2,38.24 //
GP12nardp2_u:4362: varjyaṃ paryuṣitaṃ toyaṃ varjyaṃ puryuṣitaṃ dalam /
GP12nardp2_u:4363: na varjyaṃ jāhnavītoyaṃ na varjyaṃ tulasīdalam // NarP_2,38.26 //
GP12nardp2_u:4364: meroḥ suvarṇasya ca sarvaratnaiḥ saṃkhyopalānāmudakasya vāpi /
GP12nardp2_u:4365: gaṅgājalānāṃ na tu śaktirasti vaktuṃ guṇākhyāparimāṇamatra // NarP_2,38.27 //
GP12nardp2_u:4369: viśiṣṭā yatprayacchanti bhaktebhyo vāñchitaṃ phalam // NarP_2,38.29 //
GP12nardp2_u:4373: apahatya tamastīvraṃ bhāti sūryo yathodaye // NarP_2,38.31 //
GP12nardp2_u:4375: vīkṣya gaṅgāṃ bhavetpūtaḥ puruṣo nātra saṃśayaḥ // NarP_2,38.32 //
GP12nardp2_u:4377: sarpavatkañcukaṃ muktvā pāpahīno bhavetsa vai // NarP_2,38.33 //
GP12nardp2_u:4383: yaḥ pumānsa vimucyeta pātakaiḥ pūrvasaṃcitaiḥ // NarP_2,38.36 //
GP12nardp2_u:4384: yo vai gaṅgāṃ samāśritya nityaṃ tiṣṭhati nirbhayaḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:4385: sa eva devairmartyaiśca pūjanīyo maharṣibhiḥ // NarP_2,38.37 //
GP12nardp2_u:4387: vāsa eva hi gaṅgāyāṃ sarvato 'pi viśiṣyate // NarP_2,38.38 //
GP12nardp2_u:4389: svargamokṣapradā gaṅgā sukhasevyā yataḥ sthitā // NarP_2,38.39 //
GP12nardp2_u:4391: na tatphalamavāproti gaṅgāṃ sevya yadāpnuyāt // NarP_2,38.40 //
GP12nardp2_u:4393: yatphalaṃ labhate martyo gaṅgāyāṃ taddinena vai // NarP_2,38.41 //
GP12nardp2_u:4395: gaṅgātīre sukhaṃ tiṣṭhetsa vai mokṣasya bhājanam // NarP_2,38.42 //
GP12nardp2_u:4399: kṛcchrāṇi sarvadā kṛtvā yatphalaṃ sukhamaśnute // NarP_2,38.44 //
GP12nardp2_u:4411: kṛtakṛtyo bhavenmartyo gaṅgāṃ prāpyaiva kevalam // NarP_2,38.50 //
GP12nardp2_u:4413: bhaktyā tajjalasaṃsparśī tajjalaṃ pibate ca yaḥ // NarP_2,38.51 //
GP12nardp2_u:4414: anāyāsena hi naro mokṣo pāyaṃ sa vindati /
GP12nardp2_u:4415: dīkṣitaḥ sarvayajñeṣu somapānaṃ dine dine // NarP_2,38.52 //
GP12nardp2_u:4417: dehaṃ tyaktvā narāste tu modante śivasannidhau // NarP_2,38.53 //
GP12nardp2_u:4427: svacchandaṃ yaḥ pibedaṃbhastasya muktiḥ kare sthitā // NarP_2,38.58 //
GP12nardp2_u:4433: yaḥ pibettu yatheṣṭhaṃ hi gaṅgāmbhaḥ sa viśiṣyate // NarP_2,38.61 //
GP12nardp2_u:4434: gaṅgāṃ paśyati yaḥ stauti snāti bhaktyā pibejjalam /
GP12nardp2_u:4435: sa svargaṃ jñānamamalaṃ yogaṃ mokṣaṃ ca vindati // NarP_2,38.62 //
GP12nardp2_u:4440: śṛṇu mohini vakṣyāmi gaṅgāyā darśane phalam /
GP12nardp2_u:4442: bhavanti nirviṣāḥ sarpā yathā tārkṣyasya daśa nāt /
GP12nardp2_u:4445: pumāṃstārayate gaṅgāṃ vīkṣya spṛṣṭvāvagāhya ca // NarP_2,39.3 //
GP12nardp2_u:4451: nirghṛṇatvaṃ ca naśyanti gaṅgādarśana mātrataḥ // NarP_2,39.6 //
GP12nardp2_u:4455: bhaktyā yadicchati naraḥ śāśvataṃ padamavyayam // NarP_2,39.8 //
GP12nardp2_u:4460: naimiṣe ca kurukṣetre narmadāyāṃ ca puṣkare /
GP12nardp2_u:4461: snānātsaṃsparśanā sevya yatphalaṃ labhate naraḥ // NarP_2,39.11 //
GP12nardp2_u:4463: atha te smaraṇasyāpi gaṅgāyā bhūpabhāmini // NarP_2,39.12 //
GP12nardp2_u:4467: yojanānāṃ sahasreṣu gaṅgāṃ smarati yo naraḥ // NarP_2,39.14 //
GP12nardp2_u:4468: api duṣkṛtakarmā hi labhate paramāṃ gatim /
GP12nardp2_u:4472: yaḥ smaretsatataṃ gaṅgāṃ sa ca mucyeta bandhanāt /
GP12nardp2_u:4473: sahasrayojanasthāśca gaṅgāṃ bhaktyā smaranti ye // NarP_2,39.17 //
GP12nardp2_u:4475: ye ca smaranti vai gaṅgāṃ gaṅgābhaktiparāśca ye // NarP_2,39.18 //
GP12nardp2_u:4479: manasā saṃsmaredyastu gaṅgāṃ dūrasthito naraḥ // NarP_2,39.20 //
GP12nardp2_u:4481: gaṅgā gaṅgā japannāma yojanānāṃ śate sthitaḥ // NarP_2,39.21 //
GP12nardp2_u:4491: brahmahā guruhāgoghnaḥ spṛṣṭo vā sarvapātakaiḥ // NarP_2,39.26 //
GP12nardp2_u:4493: kadā drakṣyāmi tāṃ gaṅgāṃ kadā snānaṃ labhe hyaham // NarP_2,39.27 //
GP12nardp2_u:4495: atha snānaphalaṃ devi gaṅgāyāḥ pravadāmi te // NarP_2,39.28 //
GP12nardp2_u:4497: snātasya gaṅgāsalile sadyaḥ pāpaṃ praṇaśyati // NarP_2,39.29 //
GP12nardp2_u:4500: vyuṣṭirbhavati yā puṃsāṃ na sā kratuśatairapi /
GP12nardp2_u:4501: apahatya tamastīvraṃ yathā bhātyudaye raviḥ // NarP_2,39.31 //
GP12nardp2_u:4509: rātrau divā ca saṃdhyāyāṃ gaṅgāyāṃ tu prayatnataḥ // NarP_2,39.35 //
GP12nardp2_u:4515: gaṅgā snānātparaṃ snānaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati // NarP_2,39.38 //
GP12nardp2_u:4518: gaṅgāsnānena bhaktyā tu modate divi devavat /
GP12nardp2_u:4519: varṣaṃ snāti ca gaṅgāyāṃ yo naro bhaktisaṃyutaḥ // NarP_2,39.40 //
GP12nardp2_u:4520: tasya syādvaiṣṇave loke sthitiḥ kalpaṃ na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:4521: āmṛtyuṃ snāti gaṅgāyāṃ yo naro nityameva ca // NarP_2,39.41 //
GP12nardp2_u:4525: gaṅgāyāṃ snāti yo martyo nairantaryeṇa nityadā // NarP_2,39.43 //
GP12nardp2_u:4526: jīvanmuktaḥ sa cātraiva mṛto viṣṇupadaṃ vrajet /
GP12nardp2_u:4531: haridvāre prayāge ca siṃdhusaṃge phalādhikā // NarP_2,39.46 //
GP12nardp2_u:4532: ye madīyāṃśusaṃtapte jale te snānti jāhnavi /
GP12nardp2_u:4533: te bhitvā maṇḍalaṃ yānti mokṣaṃ ceti ravervacaḥ // NarP_2,39.47 //
GP12nardp2_u:4534: yo gṛhe sve sthito 'pi tvāṃ snāne saṃkīrtayiṣyati /
GP12nardp2_u:4535: so 'pi yāsyati nākaṃ vai ityāha varuṇaśca tām // NarP_2,39.48 //
GP12nardp2_u:4538: atha kālaviśeṣe tu gaṅgāsnānasya te phalam /
GP12nardp2_u:4540: nairantaryeṇa gaṅgāyā māghe snāti ca yo naraḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:4543: nairantaryeṇa vidhivadgaṅgāyāṃ snāti yo naraḥ // NarP_2,40.3 //
GP12nardp2_u:4545: so 'pi viṣṇupadaṃ yāti kulānāṃ śatamuddharan // NarP_2,40.4 //
GP12nardp2_u:4546: saṃkrāntiṣu tu sarvāsu snātvā gaṅgājale naraḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:4549: tapaḥsamaṃ kārtike 'pi gaṅgāsnāne phalaṃ viduḥ // NarP_2,40.6 //
GP12nardp2_u:4553: kārtike vāpi vaiśākhe iti prāha pitā tava // NarP_2,40.8 //
GP12nardp2_u:4554: manvādau ca yugādau yatproktaṃ gaṅgājale phalam /
GP12nardp2_u:4555: snānaina yājyavanite trimāsyāpi ca tatphalam // NarP_2,40.9 //
GP12nardp2_u:4557: ārdrāyāṃ ca caturdaśyāṃ gaṅgāsnānaṃ sudurlabham // NarP_2,40.10 //
GP12nardp2_u:4561: amāyāṃ ca tathāṣṭamyāṃ māghāsitadale sati // NarP_2,40.12 //
GP12nardp2_u:4566: janmarkṣe tu kṛte snāne gaṅgāyāṃ bhaktibhāvataḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:4567: janmaprabhṛti pāpaṃ vai saṃcitaṃ hi vinaśyati // NarP_2,40.15 //
GP12nardp2_u:4571: aruṇodayake snāyī sa tu jātismaro bhavet // NarP_2,40.17 //
GP12nardp2_u:4576: gaṅgātīre tu saṃprāptā indoḥ koṭī raverdaśa /
GP12nardp2_u:4578: gaṅgāyāṃ yadi labhyeta sūryagrahaśataiḥ samā // NarP_2,40.20 //
GP12nardp2_u:4579: jyeṣṭhe māsi kṣitisutadine śuklapakṣe daśamyāṃ haste śailādavataradasau jāhnavī martyalokam /
GP12nardp2_u:4580: pāpānyasyāṃ harati hi tithau sā daśaiṣādyagaṅgā puṇyaṃ dadyādapi śataguṇaṃ vājimedhakratośca // NarP_2,40.21 //
GP12nardp2_u:4582: govindadvādaśīṃ prāpya tāni me hana jāhnavi // NarP_2,40.22 //
GP12nardp2_u:4584: guruṇā yāti saṃyogaṃ tanmahatvaṃ titheḥ smṛtam // NarP_2,40.23 //
GP12nardp2_u:4590: sarvatra durlabhā gaṅgā triṣu sthāneṣu cādhikā // NarP_2,40.26 //
GP12nardp2_u:4592: eṣu snātā divaṃ yānti ye mṛtāste 'punarbhavāḥ // NarP_2,40.27 //
GP12nardp2_u:4595: uṣitvā tatra māsārddhaṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ viśvajitāṃ phalam /
GP12nardp2_u:4596: daśāyutānāṃ tu gavāṃ dānapuṇyaṃ vidurbudhāḥ // NarP_2,40.29 //
GP12nardp2_u:4599: tīrthaṃ ca saukaraṃ nāma mahāpuṇyaṃ śubhe śṛṇu /
GP12nardp2_u:4606: naśyanti sarvajanmotthaṃ pātakaṃ cāpi mohini // NarP_2,40.34 //
GP12nardp2_u:4607: atrānyatkāpilaṃ tīrthaṃ yatra snāto naraḥ śubhe /
GP12nardp2_u:4610: tīrthe kanakhale snātvā dhūtapāpo vrajeddivam // NarP_2,40.36 //
GP12nardp2_u:4614: supuṇyayā mahāpuṇyā svasā svasreva saṃgatā // NarP_2,40.38 //
GP12nardp2_u:4619: tatastu gāṇḍavaṃ tīrthaṃ gaṇḍakī yatra saṃgatā /
GP12nardp2_u:4620: gosahasrasya dānaṃ ca tatra snānaṃ samaṃ dvayam // NarP_2,40.41 //
GP12nardp2_u:4621: rāmatīrthaṃ tataḥ puṇyaṃ vaikuṇṭhaṃ yatra sannidhau /
GP12nardp2_u:4622: somatīrthaṃ tataḥ puṇyaṃ yatrāsau nakulo muniḥ // NarP_2,40.42 //
GP12nardp2_u:4630: viśvāmitrasya bhaginī gaṅgayā yatra saṃgatā // NarP_2,40.46 //
GP12nardp2_u:4632: jahnuhrade mahātīrthe snāto martyo hi mohini // NarP_2,40.47 //
GP12nardp2_u:4636: śiloccayaṃ mahātīrthaṃ yatra taptvā tapaḥ prajāḥ // NarP_2,40.49 //
GP12nardp2_u:4642: pradyumnatīrthaṃ tapasā khyātaṃ yatra smaro hareḥ // NarP_2,40.52 //
GP12nardp2_u:4644: tato dakṣaprayāgaṃ tu gaṅgāto yamunāgata // NarP_2,40.53 //
GP12nardp2_u:4645: snātvā tatrākṣayaṃ puṇyaṃ prayāga iva labhyate // NarP_2,40.54 //
GP12nardp2_u:4646: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇottarabhāge mohinīvasusaṃvāde gaṅgāmāhātmye sthalaviśeṣasnānaphalakathanaṃ nāma catvāriṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp2_u:4649: sāvadhānā śṛṇuṣva tvaṃ brahmaputri nṛpapriye // NarP_2,41.1 //
GP12nardp2_u:4651: teṣāṃ kulānāṃ lakṣaṃ tu bhavāttārayate śivā // NarP_2,41.2 //
GP12nardp2_u:4653: puṇyaṃ lakṣaguṇaṃ kartuṃ samarthā dvijapāvanī // NarP_2,41.3 //
GP12nardp2_u:4655: akṣayāṃ tu prakurvanti tṛptiṃ mohini durlabhām // NarP_2,41.4 //
GP12nardp2_u:4659: tarpyamāṇāḥ parāṃ tṛptiṃ yānti gaṅgājalaiḥ śubhaiḥ // NarP_2,41.6 //
GP12nardp2_u:4660: ya icchetsaphalaṃ janma saṃtatiṃ vā śubhānane /
GP12nardp2_u:4665: te tarpitā gāṅgajalairmokṣe yānti vidhervacaḥ // NarP_2,41.9 //
GP12nardp2_u:4667: gaṅgāyāṃ pitaraḥ sarve suprītāḥ sūryavarcasaḥ // NarP_2,41.10 //
GP12nardp2_u:4673: gaṅgāyāṃ tu naraḥ snātvā yo nityaṃ liṅgamarcayet // NarP_2,41.13 //
GP12nardp2_u:4674: ekena janmanā mokṣaṃ paramānpoti sa dhruvam /
GP12nardp2_u:4680: raupyaiḥ śataguṇaṃ puṇyaṃ hemaiḥ koṭiguṇaṃ smṛtam /
GP12nardp2_u:4681: evamarghe ca naivedye balipūjādiṣu kramāt // NarP_2,41.17 //
GP12nardp2_u:4683: vibhave sati yo mohānna kuryādvidhivistaram // NarP_2,41.18 //
GP12nardp2_u:4685: devānāṃ darśanaṃ puṇyaṃ darśanātsparśanaṃ varam // NarP_2,41.19 //
GP12nardp2_u:4691: putrapautraiśca saṃyuktaḥ sa ca vai svargamāpnuyāt /
GP12nardp2_u:4692: āpaḥ kṣīraṃ kuśāgrāṇi ghṛtaṃ dadhi tathā madhu // NarP_2,41.22 //
GP12nardp2_u:4696: gaṅgātīre pratiṣṭhāṃ tu yaḥ karoti narottamaḥ // NarP_2,41.24 //
GP12nardp2_u:4700: salakṣaṇāni kṛtvā tu pratiṣṭhāpya dine dine // NarP_2,41.26 //
GP12nardp2_u:4704: aṣṭākṣaraṃ japedbhaktya muktistasya kare sthitā // NarP_2,41.28 //
GP12nardp2_u:4706: ṣaṇmāsaṃ japataḥ sarvā hyupatiṣṭhanti siddhayaḥ // NarP_2,41.29 //
GP12nardp2_u:4707: namaḥ śivāyeti mantraṃ satāraṃ vidhinā tu yaḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:4709: pañcākṣarī siddhavidyā śiva eva na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:4710: apavitraḥ pavitro vā japanniṣpātako bhavet // NarP_2,41.31 //
GP12nardp2_u:4711: pūjitāyāṃ tu gaṅgāyāṃ pūjitāḥ sarva devatāḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:4720: sa eva devasadṛśo bahukāle phalādhikaḥ // NarP_2,41.36 //
GP12nardp2_u:4724: akṣayāyāṃ tu vaiśākhe kārtike 'pi śubhānane // NarP_2,41.38 //
GP12nardp2_u:4726: viṣṇuṃ gaṅgāṃ ca śaṃbhuṃ ca pūjayedbhakti bhāvataḥ // NarP_2,41.39 //
GP12nardp2_u:4732: tato mahītalaṃ prāpya rājā bhavati dhārmikaḥ // NarP_2,41.42 //
GP12nardp2_u:4735: yajño dānaṃ tapo japyaṃ śrāddhaṃ ca surapūjanam /
GP12nardp2_u:4736: gaṅgāyāṃ tu kṛtaṃ sarvaṃ koṭikoṭiguṇaṃ bhavet // NarP_2,41.44 //
GP12nardp2_u:4738: ghṛtadhenuṃ vidhānena tasya puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu // NarP_2,41.45 //
GP12nardp2_u:4745: tathaiva gopradānaṃ ca vidhinā kurute tu yaḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:4760: svargasthitānmokṣayitvā svayaṃ jñānī ca mohini // NarP_2,41.56 //
GP12nardp2_u:4762: paraṃ vairāgyamāpannaḥ paraṃ brahmādhi gacchati // NarP_2,41.57 //
GP12nardp2_u:4764: tribhāgahīnaṃ gocarma mānamāha vidhiḥ svayam // NarP_2,41.58 //
GP12nardp2_u:4765: grāmaṃ gaṅgātaṭe yo vai brāhmaṇebhyaḥ prayacchati /
GP12nardp2_u:4772: bhūmireṇvabdasaṃkhyākaṃ kālaṃ sthitvā ca tatra saḥ // NarP_2,41.62 //
GP12nardp2_u:4774: akṣayāyāṃ tu yo devi svarṇaṃ ṣoḍaśamāsikam // NarP_2,41.63 //
GP12nardp2_u:4780: gaṃmātīre naro yastu nānāvṛkṣaiḥ samanvitam // NarP_2,41.66 //
GP12nardp2_u:4787: śivāya viṣṇave vāpi durgāyai bhāskarāya ca /
GP12nardp2_u:4788: prayacchati tathā bhaktyā sarvārthaṃ parikalpya ca // NarP_2,41.70 //
GP12nardp2_u:4790: yāvanti teṣāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ puṣpamūlaphalāni ca // NarP_2,41.71 //
GP12nardp2_u:4791: bījāni ca vicitrāṇi teṣāṃ mūlāni vai tathā /
GP12nardp2_u:4793: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇottarabhāge mohinīvasusaṃvāde gaṅgāmāhātmye dānādividhivarṇanaṃ nāmaikacatvāriṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp2_u:4797: aho gaṅgāsamaṃ tīrthaṃ nāsti kiñciddharā tale /
GP12nardp2_u:4800: tathā kathayaviprendra bhaktāhaṃ tava sarvadā // NarP_2,42.3 //
GP12nardp2_u:4803: vedāgamānāṃ tattvajñaḥ smayamāna uvāca ha // NarP_2,42.4 //
GP12nardp2_u:4805: śṛṇu mohini vakṣyāmi yatpṛṣṭaṃ hi tvayā mama /
GP12nardp2_u:4806: guḍadhenuvidhānaṃ ca yathā śāstre prakīrtitam // NarP_2,42.5 //
GP12nardp2_u:4811: vatsaṃ bhāreṇa kurvīta bhārābhyāṃ madhyamā smṛtā /
GP12nardp2_u:4812: arddhabhāreṇa vatsaḥ syātkaniṣṭhā bhārakeṇa tu // NarP_2,42.8 //
GP12nardp2_u:4825: yā lakṣmīḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ yā ca deveṣvavasthitā /
GP12nardp2_u:4826: dhenurūpeṇa sā devī mama śāntiṃ prayacchatu // NarP_2,42.15 //
GP12nardp2_u:4827: dehasthā yā ca rudrāṇāṃ śaṅkarasya sadā priyā /
GP12nardp2_u:4828: dhenurūpeṇa sā devī mama pāpaṃ vyapohatu // NarP_2,42.16 //
GP12nardp2_u:4832: lakṣmīryā lokapālānāṃ sā dhenurvaradāstu me // NarP_2,42.18 //
GP12nardp2_u:4833: svadhā yā pitṛmukhyānāṃ svāhā yajñamujā ca yā /
GP12nardp2_u:4834: sarvapāpaharā dhenuḥ sā me śāntiṃ prayacchatu // NarP_2,42.19 //
GP12nardp2_u:4838: tāsāṃ svarūpaṃ vakṣyāmi śāstrokaṃ śṛṇu mohini // NarP_2,42.21 //
GP12nardp2_u:4844: kuṃbhāḥ syurdravadhenūnāṃ cetarāsāṃ tu rāśayaḥ // NarP_2,42.24 //
GP12nardp2_u:4846: navanītena tailena tathā ke 'pi maharṣayaḥ // NarP_2,42.25 //
GP12nardp2_u:4854: tīrtheṣu svagṛhe vāpi gaṅgātīre viśeṣataḥ // NarP_2,42.29 //
GP12nardp2_u:4855: evaṃ datvā vidhānena dhenuṃ dvijavarāya ca /
GP12nardp2_u:4856: pradakṣiṇīkṛtya vipraṃ dakṣiṇābhiḥ pratoṣya ca // NarP_2,42.30 //
GP12nardp2_u:4861: pāyasaṃ kārayitvā ca datvā madhu ghṛtaṃ tathā /
GP12nardp2_u:4862: pratyekaṃ palamātraṃ ca bhaktibhāvena saṃyutaḥ // NarP_2,42.33 //
GP12nardp2_u:4864: tathā guñjārddhamātraṃ ca suvarṇaṃ rūpyameva ca // NarP_2,42.34 //
GP12nardp2_u:4868: yathāśakti mahābhaktyā gaṅgāyāṃ caiva nikṣipet // NarP_2,42.36 //
GP12nardp2_u:4870: oṅgaṅgāyai nārāyaṇyai śivāyai ca namonamaḥ // NarP_2,42.37 //
GP12nardp2_u:4871: etadeva vidhānaṃ tu māsi māsi ca mohini /
GP12nardp2_u:4872: paurṇamāsyāmapāyāṃ vā kāryaṃ prātaḥ samāhitaiḥ // NarP_2,42.38 //
GP12nardp2_u:4873: varṣaṃ yastu naro bhaktyā yathā śaktyarcayanmudā /
GP12nardp2_u:4875: dine vāpi tathā rātrā niyamena ca mohini /
GP12nardp2_u:4880: dṛṣṭvā sva cakṣuṣā martyaḥ kṛtakṛtyo bhavecchubhe // NarP_2,42.42 //
GP12nardp2_u:4883: etaddhidhānaṃ ca mayoditaṃ te pṛṣṭaṃ hi sarvaṃ guḍadhenupūrvam /
GP12nardp2_u:4884: gaṅgārcanaṃ muktikaraṃ vrataṃ tta sāṃvatsaraṃ śrīpatituṣṭidaṃ hi // NarP_2,42.44 //
GP12nardp2_u:4885: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇottarabhāge mohinīvasusaṃvāde gaṅgāmāhātmye guḍadhenuvidhikathanaṃ nāma dvicatvāriṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp2_u:4888: punaḥ papraccha rājendraṃ taṃ vipraṃ svapurohitam // NarP_2,43.1 //
GP12nardp2_u:4890: śrutaṃ vipra mayā sarvaṃ godānādi śubhāvaham /
GP12nardp2_u:4892: gaṅgādīnāṃ pūjanaṃ ca sthāpanaṃ tatra vā dvija /
GP12nardp2_u:4893: kiṃ phalaṃ vada sarvajña tvāmahaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatā // NarP_2,43.3 //
GP12nardp2_u:4895: patyā virahitā cāhaṃ putrahīnā vidāṃvara // NarP_2,43.4 //
GP12nardp2_u:4898: devatārādhanaṃ brūhi yacchrutvā mucyate hyaghāt // NarP_2,43.5 //
GP12nardp2_u:4901: sabhājya mohinīṃ bhūpa prāha vedavidāṃ varaḥ // NarP_2,43.6 //
GP12nardp2_u:4903: sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ tvayā devi lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā // NarP_2,43.7 //
GP12nardp2_u:4905: vṛṣadhvajena kathitaṃ śivena dayayā purā // NarP_2,43.8 //
GP12nardp2_u:4907: devaistu bhuktaṃ pūrvāhṇe madhyāhne ṛṣibhistathā // NarP_2,43.9 //
GP12nardp2_u:4916: naivedyaṃ ca nivedyaiva kṛśarānnaṃ śivasya tu /
GP12nardp2_u:4921: paurṇamāsyāṃ tu gandhaiśca gaṅgāyāḥ salilaistathā // NarP_2,43.16 //
GP12nardp2_u:4923: tathaiva hemapuṣpaṃ ca liṅgamūrdhni vinikṣipet // NarP_2,43.17 //
GP12nardp2_u:4927: tadalābhe tu sauvarṇaiḥ paṅkajaiḥ pūjayeddharam // NarP_2,43.19 //
GP12nardp2_u:4928: pāyasaṃ cātra madhvaktaṃ ghṛtayuktaṃ ca guggulam /
GP12nardp2_u:4931: kṛṣṇagomithunaṃ caiva sarūpaṃ ca nivedayet // NarP_2,43.21 //
GP12nardp2_u:4933: varjayenmadhu māṃsaṃ ca taṃ māsaṃ brahmacaryavān // NarP_2,43.22 //
GP12nardp2_u:4948: śivaṃ saṃpūjya puṣpādyairbhojyaṃ tu saṃnivedya ca /
GP12nardp2_u:4949: kāṣṭhamaunena bhuñjāno vaṭakāṣṭena vai tathā // NarP_2,43.30 //
GP12nardp2_u:4951: śivaliṅgasamīpe tu gaṅgātīre niśi svapet // NarP_2,43.31 //
GP12nardp2_u:4952: paurṇamāsyāṃ prabhāte tu gaṅgāyāṃ vidhinā tathā /
GP12nardp2_u:4959: evaṃ sakṛcca yo bhaktyā karoti śraddhayānvitaḥ // NarP_2,43.35 //
GP12nardp2_u:4961: tapaḥ kṛtvā tu niyamādyatpuṇyaṃ tadasaṃśayam // NarP_2,43.36 //
GP12nardp2_u:4969: ekacchatreṇa sa mahīṃ pālayatyājñayā saha // NarP_2,43.40 //
GP12nardp2_u:4970: ante vairāgyasaṃpanno gaṅgāṃ sa labhate punaḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:4971: sa tayā śraddhayā yukto gaṅgāyāṃ maraṇaṃ labhet // NarP_2,43.41 //
GP12nardp2_u:4972: tathā tatra smṛtiṃ labdhvā mokṣamāpnoti sa dhruvam /
GP12nardp2_u:4973: jyeṣṭhe māsi site pakṣe daśamyāṃ hastasaṃyute // NarP_2,43.42 //
GP12nardp2_u:4974: gaṅgātīre tu puruṣo nārī vā bhaktibhāvataḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:4975: niśāyāṃ jāgaraṃ kṛtvā gaṅgāṃ daśavidhaistataḥ // NarP_2,43.43 //
GP12nardp2_u:4978: snātvā bhaktyā tu jāhnavyāṃ daśakṛtvo vidhānataḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:4979: daśaprasṛti kṛṣṇaṃśca tilānsarpiśca vai jale // NarP_2,43.45 //
GP12nardp2_u:4981: tato gaṅgātaṭe ramye hemnā rūpyeṇa vā tathā // NarP_2,43.46 //
GP12nardp2_u:4985: saṃsthāpya pūjayeddevīṃ tadalābhe mṛdādi vā // NarP_2,43.48 //
GP12nardp2_u:4992: dhyātvā jale yathāproktāṃ tatrārcāyāṃ tu pūjayet /
GP12nardp2_u:4996: nārāyaṇaṃ maheśaṃ ca brahmāṇaṃ bhāskaraṃ tathā /
GP12nardp2_u:4997: bhagīrathaṃ ca nṛpatiṃ himavantaṃ nageśvaram // NarP_2,43.54 //
GP12nardp2_u:4999: daśaprasthāṃ stilāndadyāddaśa viprebhya eva ca // NarP_2,43.55 //
GP12nardp2_u:5004: gaṅgāyāṃ prakṣipetpūrvvaṃ mantreṇaiva tu mantravit // NarP_2,43.57 //
GP12nardp2_u:5012: paradāropasevā ca kāyikaṃ tribidhaṃ smṛtam // NarP_2,43.61 //
GP12nardp2_u:5018: mucyate nātra saṃdeho brahmaṇo vacanaṃ yathā // NarP_2,43.64 //
GP12nardp2_u:5021: oṃ namo daśaharāyai nārāyaṇyai gaṅgāyai namaḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:5022: iti mantreṇa yo martyo dine tasmindivāniśam // NarP_2,43.66 //
GP12nardp2_u:5024: uddareddaśa pūrvāṇi parāṇi ca bhavārṇavāt // NarP_2,43.67 //
GP12nardp2_u:5026: gaṅgāgre taddine japyaṃ viṣṇupūjāṃ pravartayet // NarP_2,43.68 //
GP12nardp2_u:5027: oṃ namaḥ śivāyai gaṅgāyai śivadāyai namo 'stu te /
GP12nardp2_u:5028: namo 'stu viṣṇurūpiṇyai gaṅgāyai te namo namaḥ // NarP_2,43.69 //
GP12nardp2_u:5030: sarvasya sarvavyādhīnāṃ bhiṣakśreṣṭhe namo 'stu te // NarP_2,43.70 //
GP12nardp2_u:5042: namaste viśvamitrāyai revatyai te namonamaḥ // NarP_2,43.76 //
GP12nardp2_u:5043: bṛhatyai te namo nityaṃ lokadhātryai namonamaḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:5044: namaste viśvamukhyāyai nandinyai te namonamaḥ // NarP_2,43.77 //
GP12nardp2_u:5048: śāntāyai te pratiṣṭhāyai varadāyai namonamaḥ // NarP_2,43.79 //
GP12nardp2_u:5052: viluṣāyai durgahantryai dakṣāyai te namonamaḥ // NarP_2,43.81 //
GP12nardp2_u:5054: parāpare pare tubhya namo mokṣaprade sadā /
GP12nardp2_u:5055: gaṅgā mamāgrato bhūyādgaṅgā me pārśvayostathā // NarP_2,43.82 //
GP12nardp2_u:5056: gaṅgā me sarvato bhūyāttvayi gaṅge 'stu me sthitiḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:5057: ādau tvamante madhye ca sarvā tvaṃ gāṅgate śive // NarP_2,43.83 //
GP12nardp2_u:5059: gaṅge tvaṃ paramātmā ca śivastubhyaṃ namonamaḥ // NarP_2,43.84 //
GP12nardp2_u:5060: itīdaṃ paṭhati stotraṃ nityaṃ bhaktiparastu yaḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:5066: idaṃ stotraṃ gṛhe yasya likhitaṃ paripūjyate /
GP12nardp2_u:5067: nāgnicaurabhayaṃ tatra pāpebhyo 'pi bhayaṃ nahi // NarP_2,43.88 //
GP12nardp2_u:5069: japaṃstu daśakṛtvaśca daridro vāpi cākṣamaḥ // NarP_2,43.89 //
GP12nardp2_u:5072: yathā gaurī tathā gaṅgā tasmādgauryāstu pūjane /
GP12nardp2_u:5075: umā yathā tathā gaṅgā cātra bhedo na vidyate // NarP_2,43.92 //
GP12nardp2_u:5077: lakṣmīgauryataraṃ yaśca prabrūte mūḍhadhīstu saḥ // NarP_2,43.93 //
GP12nardp2_u:5079: dhanyā dehaṃ vimuñcanti hṛdayasthe janārdane // NarP_2,43.94 //
GP12nardp2_u:5080: ye muñcanti narā-prāṇān gaṅgāyāṃ vidhinaṃ dini /
GP12nardp2_u:5081: te viṣṇulokaṃ gacchanti stūyamānā divisthitaiḥ // NarP_2,43.95 //
GP12nardp2_u:5083: sa yāti na punarjanma brahmasāyujyameti ca // NarP_2,43.96 //
GP12nardp2_u:5085: sā getistyajataḥ prāṇān gaṅgāyāṃ tu śarīriṇaḥ // NarP_2,43.97 //
GP12nardp2_u:5086: anaśanaṃ gṛhītvā yo gaṅgātīre mṛto naraḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:5087: satyameva paraṃ lokamāpnoti pitṛbhiḥ saha // NarP_2,43.98 //
GP12nardp2_u:5089: gatāni bahujanmāni yatra yatra mṛtāni ca // NarP_2,43.99 //
GP12nardp2_u:5090: mahāṃścāpi gataḥ kālo yatra tatrāpi gacchataḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:5091: atradūre samīpe ca sadṛśaṃ yojanadvayam // NarP_2,43.100 //
GP12nardp2_u:5094: gaṅgāyāṃ tu mṛto martyaḥ svargaṃ mokṣaṃ ca vindati /
GP12nardp2_u:5096: spṛśedvā pāpaśīlo 'pi sa vai yāti parāṃ gatim // NarP_2,43.103 //
GP12nardp2_u:5097: gaṅgāṃ gatvā yaiḥ śarīraṃ visṛṣṭaṃ prāptā dhīrāste tu devaiḥ samatvam /
GP12nardp2_u:5098: tasmātsurvānprohya muktipradānvai sevedgaṅgāmā śarīrasya pātam // NarP_2,43.104 //
GP12nardp2_u:5099: antarikṣe kṣitau toye pāpīyānapi yo mṛtaḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:5102: cintayenmanasā gaṅgāṃ sa gatiṃ paramāṃ labhet // NarP_2,43.106 //
GP12nardp2_u:5103: yatra tatra mṛto vāpi maraṇe samupasthite /
GP12nardp2_u:5104: bhaktyā gaṅgāṃ smaranyāti śaivaṃ vā vaiṣṇavaṃ puram // NarP_2,43.107 //
GP12nardp2_u:5106: plāvayitvā divaṃ ninye yā pāpānyagarātmajān // NarP_2,43.108 //
GP12nardp2_u:5109: gagātoye tu yasyāsthi nītvā prakṣipyate naraiḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:5116: tadasthipiṇḍaṃ puṭake nidhāya paśyan diśaṃ pretagaṇopagūḍhām // NarP_2,43.113 //
GP12nardp2_u:5117: namo 'stu dharmāya vadanpraviśya jalaṃ sa me prīta iti kṣipecca /
GP12nardp2_u:5118: snātvā tatastīrthavaṭākṣayaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā pradadyādatha dakṣiṇāṃ tu // NarP_2,43.114 //
GP12nardp2_u:5119: evaṃ kṛtvā pretapure sthitasya svarge gatiḥ syātta mahendratulyā // NarP_2,43.115 //
GP12nardp2_u:5121: tatra nārāyaṇaḥ svāmī nānyaḥ svāmī kadācana // NarP_2,43.116 //
GP12nardp2_u:5126: iti keṣāṃ mataṃ devi śrutismṛtiṣu saṃmatam /
GP12nardp2_u:5128: tīraṃ tyaktvā vasetkṣetre tīre vāso na ceṣyate /
GP12nardp2_u:5131: tāṃ tu dṛṣṭvā palāyante yathā siṃhaṃ vanaukasaḥ // NarP_2,43.121 //
GP12nardp2_u:5133: siddhakṣetraṃ tu tajjñeyaṃ samantāttu triyojanam // NarP_2,43.122 //
GP12nardp2_u:5135: nimitteṣu ca sarveṣu tannivṛtto bhavennaraḥ // NarP_2,43.123 //
GP12nardp2_u:5139: janārdane tu vikrīte vikrītaṃ bhuvanatrayam // NarP_2,43.125 //
GP12nardp2_u:5140: gaṅgā tīrasamudbhūtāṃ ma-daṃ mūrghnā bibharti yaḥ /
GP12nardp2_u:5141: bibharti rūpaṃ sor'kasya tamonāśāya kevalam // NarP_2,43.126 //
GP12nardp2_u:5145: paṭhan śṛṇvannaro hyeti tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam // NarP_2,43.128 //
GP12nardp2_u:5147: vaiṣṇavīṃ gatimicchadbhiḥ śaivīṃ vā vidhinandini // NarP_2,43.129 //
GP12nardp2_u:5148: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇottarabhāge mohinīvasusaṃvāde gaṅgāmāhātmye pūjādikathaṃ nāma tricatvāriṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
